Question #769 (ID: 470272)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
মূলবিন্দু থেকে [math]x \sqrt{3}+y=12[/math] সরলরেখাটির লম্বদূরত্ব কত?

Options:
ক. [math]5[/math]
খ. [math]6[/math]
গ. [math]-5[/math]
ঘ. [math]12[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]|\mathrm{d}|=\frac{12}{\sqrt{(\sqrt{3})^{2}+1}}=6[/math]

Explanation:

Question #770 (ID: 470273)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]A (2,1 )[/math] ও [math]B(5.2)[/math] বিন্দুদ্বয়ের সংযোজন রেখাকে সমকোণে সমদ্বিখন্ডিত করে এরূপ রেখার সমীকরণ হলো-

Options:
ক. [math]5 x+2 y=6[/math]
খ. [math]7 x+3 y=9[/math]
গ. [math]9 x+5 y=11[/math]
ঘ. [math]3 x+y=12[/math]
ঙ. [math]3 x+11 y=15[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
AB এর মধ্যবিন্দু [math]\left(\frac{7}{2}, \frac{3}{2}\right)[/math]
AB এর সমীকরন [math]y-1=\frac{1-2}{2-5}(x-2) \Rightarrow y-1=\frac{1}{3}(x-2) \Rightarrow x-3 y=-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 লম্বদ্বিখন্ডকের সমীকরণ, [math]3 x+y=3\left(\frac{7}{2}\right)+\frac{3}{2} \Rightarrow 3 x+y=12[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #771 (ID: 470274)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Textiles
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]4y – 3x = 3[/math] এবং [math]3y - 4x = 5[/math] রেখা দুইটির অন্তর্গত স্থুলকোণের সমদ্বিখন্ডকের সমীকরণ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]x-y+2=0[/math]
খ. [math]-x+y+2=0[/math]
গ. [math]x+y+2=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]x+y-2=0[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]4 y-3 x-3=3 y-4 x-5 \Rightarrow y+x+2=0[/math]

Explanation:

Question #773 (ID: 470261)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোনো বিন্দুর পোলার স্থানাংক [math]\left(-4, \frac{2 \pi}{3}\right)[/math] হলে ঐ বিন্দুর কার্তেসীয় স্থানাংক কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\left(\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}, \frac{1}{2}\right)[/math]
খ. [math](-2 \sqrt{3}, 2)[/math]
গ. [math]\left(-\frac{1}{2}, \frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math](2,-2 \sqrt{3})[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]x=r \cos \theta=-4 x \cos \frac{2 \pi}{3}=2[/math]
 এবং [math]y=r \sin \theta=-2 \sqrt{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #774 (ID: 470242)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { A rod } \mathrm{AB} \text { of length } 15 \mathrm{~cm} \text { rests in between two coordinate axes in such a way that the end point } \mathrm{A} \text { lies on } \mathrm{x}-[/math] [math]\text { axis and end point } B \text { lies on } y \text {-axis. A point } P(x, y) \text { is taken on the rod in such a way that } A P=6 \mathrm{~cm} \text {. If the }[/math] [math]\text { rod moves with its ends always touching the coordinate axes, find the equation of the locus of the point } \mathrm{P} \text {. }[/math]


[Image]


Options:
A. [math]\frac{x^{2}}{81}+\frac{y^{2}}{36}=1[/math]
B. [math]\frac{x^{2}}{36}+\frac{y^{2}}{81}=1[/math]
C. [math]\frac{x^{2}}{36}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1[/math]
D. [math]\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{36}=1[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:

[Image]
[math]y=6 \sin \theta \ldots(i) ; x=9 \cos \theta.....[/math]
(ii)[math]\frac{(i)^{2}}{6}+\frac{(i i)^{2}}{9} \Rightarrow \frac{x^{2}}{81}+\frac{y^{2}}{36}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #775 (ID: 470243)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি বহুভুজের একটি কোণের পরিমাণ [math]170^{\circ}[/math] বহুভুজটির বাহুর সংখ্যা কত?

Options:
ক. [math]9[/math]
খ. [math]18[/math]
গ. [math]27[/math]
ঘ. [math]36[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{(n-2) \times 180^{\circ}}{n}=170^{\circ} \Rightarrow 180^{\circ} n-360^{\circ}=170^{\circ} n \therefore n=36[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #776 (ID: 470244)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2014-2015, 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]A(2,3),[/math] [math]B(1,5),[/math] [math]C(3,4)[/math] শীর্ষ বিশিষ্ট ত্রিভুজের ভরকেন্দ্র কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math](1,2)[/math]
খ. [math](1,3)[/math]
গ. [math](2,4)[/math]
ঘ. [math](4,8)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ভরকেন্দ্র [math]=\left(\frac{2+1+3}{3}, \frac{3+5+4}{3}\right)[/math]
 [math]\equiv(2,4)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #777 (ID: 470245)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jhenidah Government Veterinary College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি সরলরেখার সমীকরণ নির্ণয় কর যা মূল বিন্দুগামী ও [math]x-y=0[/math] রেখার উপর লম্ব।

Options:
ক. [math]x+y=-1[/math]
খ. [math]x+y=0[/math]
গ. [math]x+y=1[/math]
ঘ. [math]x+y=2[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]x-y=0[/math]
 রেখার লম্ব রেখা [math]-x-y=k ; x+y=-k......(i)[/math]
(i) নং [math](0, 0)[/math]
 বিন্দুগামী বলে [math]0+0=-\mathrm{k}=0 \quad \therefore \mathrm{k}=0 \quad \therefore \mathrm{x}+\mathrm{y}=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #778 (ID: 470246)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x=r \cos 30^{\circ}, y=r \sin 30^{\circ}[/math] এবং [math]x^{2}+y^{2}=4[/math] হলে, x এর মান কত?

Options:
A. 1
B. 2
C. 3
D. 4


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]x^{2}+y^{2}=4 \Rightarrow 4=\left(r \cos 30^{\circ}\right)^{2}+\left(r \sin 30^{\circ}\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow r^{2}\left(\cos ^{2} 30^{\circ}+\sin ^{2} 30^{\circ}\right)=4 \Rightarrow r^{2}=4 \therefore r=2[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #779 (ID: 470247)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
সমতলীয় জ্যামিতিতে স্থানাঙ্কের অবতারণা করেন-

Options:
ক. রেনে দেকার্তে
খ. লীবনিজ
গ. আর্কিমিডিস
ঘ. নিউটন


Correct Answer: A. রেনে দেকার্তে

Solution:
রেনে দেকার্তে কার্তেসীয় স্থানাঙ্ক অবতারণা করেন।

Explanation:

Question #780 (ID: 470248)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
r = a sine θ এর কার্তেসীয় সমীকরণ-

Options:
ক. [math]x^{2}+y^{2}-y=0[/math]
খ. [math]x^{2}+y^{2}+a y=0[/math]
গ. [math]x^{2}+y^{2}-a y=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]x^{2}+y^{2}+y=0[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}r=a \sin \theta \Rightarrow r^{2}=a r \sin \theta \Rightarrow x^{2}+y^{2}=a y \\\therefore x^{2}+y^{2}-a y=0\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #781 (ID: 470250)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
(–1,b) বিন্দুর পোলার স্থানাঙ্ক ( 2,120°) হলে,b এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-\sqrt{3}[/math]
খ. 1
গ. [math]\sqrt{3}[/math]
ঘ. 2


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]2=\sqrt{(-1)^{2}+b^{2}} \Rightarrow 1+b^{2}=4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow b^{2}=3 \Rightarrow b= \pm \sqrt{3}[/math]
 [math]\because\left(2,120^{\circ}\right)[/math]
 ২য় চৌকণে [math]\therefore[/math]
 b ধনাত্মক হবে [math]\therefore[/math]
 [math]b-\sqrt{3}[/math]
আবার, [math]\tan 120^{\circ}=\frac{b}{-1} \Rightarrow \tan \left(180^{\circ}-60^{\circ}\right)=-b[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{b}=-\left(-\tan 60^{\circ}\right)=\sqrt{3}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #782 (ID: 470252)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
(3, 4) এবং (5, 9) বিন্দুদ্বয়ের সংযোগ রেখাংশকে (-1, 6) বিন্দুটি কোন অনুপাতে বিভক্ত করে?

Options:
ক. 2:3 অনুপাতে অন্তর্বিভক্ত
খ. 3:2 অনুপাতে অন্তর্বিভক্ত
গ. 3:2 অনুপাতে বহির্বিভক্ত
ঘ. 2:3 অনুপাতে বহির্বিভক্ত


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
(3, 4 ) এবং (5, 9) কে k : 1 অনুপাতে (-1, 6 ) বিন্দুতেবিভক্ত হলে পাই, [math]-1[/math]
 [math]=\frac{5 k+3}{k+1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 5 k+3=-k-1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 6 k=-4[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow k[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{2}{3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 2:3 অনুপাতে বহির্বিভক্ত হয়।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #783 (ID: 470253)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2010-2011, 2016-2017, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]5x – 7y – 15 = 0[/math] সরলরেখার উপর লম্ব এবং (2, 3) বিন্দুগামী সরলরেখার সমীকরণ হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]7 x-5 y-29=0[/math]
খ. [math]5 x-7 y-31=0[/math]
গ. [math]5 x+7 y+11=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]7 x+5 y+1=0[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]7 x+5 y+k=0,(2,-3)[/math]
 বিন্দুগামী বলে [math]7.2+5(-3)+\mathrm{k}=0 \Rightarrow \mathrm{k}=1 \therefore 7 \mathrm{x}+5 \mathrm{y}+1=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #784 (ID: 470254)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2021-2022, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2013-2014, 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Barishal, University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]4 x+3 y=c[/math] এবং [math]12 x-5 y=2(c+3)[/math] রেখাদ্বয় মূলবিন্দু হতে সমদূরবর্তী। c এর মান হবে -

Options:
ক. 14
খ. 12
গ. 8
ঘ. 10


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
মূলবিন্দু হতে সমদূরবর্তী রেখাদ্বয় হলে,[math]\begin{array}{l} \pm \frac{4.0+3.0-c}{\sqrt{4^{2}+3^{2}}}= \pm \frac{12.0-5.0-2(c+3)}{\sqrt{12^{2}+5^{2}}} \Rightarrow-\frac{c}{5}=-\frac{2(c+3)}{13} \\\Rightarrow-13 c=-10 c-30 \Rightarrow-3 c=-30 \therefore c=10\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #785 (ID: 470255)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2017-2018, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোনো বৃত্তের সমান্তরাল দুটি স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ [math]2 x-4 y-9=0[/math] এবং [math]6 x-12 y+7=0[/math] বৃত্তের ব্যাসার্ধ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{5}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{17}{3 \sqrt{5}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{17}{6 \sqrt{5}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{17}{5 \sqrt{3}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]6 x-12 y+7=0 \Rightarrow 2 x-4 y+\frac{7}{3}=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 মধ্যবর্তী দূরত্ব যা বৃত্তের ব্যাস = [math]\left|\frac{\frac{7}{3}+9}{\sqrt{2^{2}+(-4)^{2}}}\right|=\frac{34}{3 \sqrt{20}}=\frac{17}{3 \sqrt{5}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 = বৃত্তের ব্যাসার্ধ [math]=\frac{17}{2 \times 3 \sqrt{5}}=\frac{17}{6 \sqrt{5}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #786 (ID: 470256)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2021-2022, 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), Mymensingh Board, Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
4y = 3 (x – 4) এবং 4y = 3 (x - 1 ) রেখা দুইটির মধ্যবর্তী দূরত্ব-

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{9}{4}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{9}{5}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{15}{8}[/math]
ঘ. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{r}4 y=3(x-4) \Rightarrow 3 x-4 y=12 \\4 y=3(x-1) \Rightarrow 3 x-4 y=3\end{array}[/math]
রেখাদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী দূরত্ব= [math]\left|\frac{12-3}{\sqrt{3^{3}+(-4)^{2}}}\right|=\left|\frac{9}{5}\right|=\frac{9}{5}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #787 (ID: 470257)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2017-2018, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Mymensingh Board, Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]4 x-3 y+2=0[/math] এবং [math]8 x-6 y-9=0[/math] সমান্তরাল রেখা দুটির মধ্যবর্তী দূরত্ব কত?

Options:
ক. 9/2
খ. [math]\frac{13}{10}[/math]
গ. 2
ঘ. [math]\frac{13}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
সমান্তরাল রেখাদ্বয়, [math]4 x-3 y+2=0[/math]
 এবং [math]8 x-6 y-9=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4 x-3 y-\frac{9}{2}=0 \therefore[/math]
 মধ্যবর্তী দূরত্ব [math]\left|\frac{2+\frac{9}{2}}{\sqrt{4^{2}+3^{2}}}\right|=\frac{13}{10}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #788 (ID: 470258)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
(4, −1) বিন্দুগামী এবং 2x + y = 4 সরলরেখার উপর লম্ব রেখাটির সমীকরণ হচ্ছে-

Options:
ক. [math]x-2 y-6=0[/math]
খ. [math]x+2 y-6=0x+2 y-6=0[/math]
গ. [math]x+2 y+6=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]x-2 y+6=0[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math](x-4)-2(y+1)=0 \therefore x-2 y-6=0[/math]

Explanation:

Question #789 (ID: 470259)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jhenidah Government Veterinary College
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি সরলরেখার সমীকরণ নির্ণয় কর যা মূলবিন্দুগামী ও x – y = 0 রেখার উপর লম্ব।

Options:
ক. x +y = - 1
খ. x + y = 0
গ. x + y = 1
ঘ. x + y = 2


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
(x - 0) + (y - 0) = 0 [math]\therefore[/math] x + y = 0

Question #790 (ID: 470225)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](1,5)[/math] এবং [math](3, 2)[/math] বিন্দুদ্বয়ের সংযোগ রেখাংশকে x অক্ষরেখা কোন অনুপাতে বিভক্ত করে?

Options:
ক. 5: 2 অনুপাতে অন্তর্বিভক্ত
খ. 5:2 অনুপাতে বহির্বিভক্ত
গ. 2:5 অনুপাতে অন্তর্বিভক্ত
ঘ. 2:5 অনুপাতে বহির্বিভক্ত


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
x অক্ষকে (a, 0) বিন্দুতে ছেদ করলে, [math]\frac{\alpha-1}{-5}=\frac{3-1}{2-5} \Rightarrow \alpha=\frac{13}{3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 বহিবিভক্ত করে [math]\frac{13}{3}-1: \frac{13}{3}-3=5: 2[/math]
 অনুপাত।
[Image]


Explanation:

Question #792 (ID: 470227)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018, 2015-2016, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](a, O), (0, b), (1, 1 )[/math] বিন্দুত্রয় সমরেখ হবার শর্ত কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]a+b=a b[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{a}-\frac{1}{b}=1[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{b}-\frac{1}{a}=1[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{a}+\frac{1}{b}=\frac{2}{a b}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math](a,0). (0,b), (1, 1 )[/math]
 বিন্দুত্রয় সমরেখ হবার শর্ত হচ্ছে, [math]\frac{a-0}{a-b}=\frac{0-1}{b-1} \Rightarrow a b-a=b \therefore a+b=a b[/math]


Explanation:

Question #793 (ID: 470228)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি রেখা দ্বারা উভয় অক্ষ থেকে কর্তিত অংশের পরিমাণ সমান এবং রেখাটি [math](-2, 1)[/math] বিন্দু দিয়ে যায়, রেখাটির সমীকরণ কী?

Options:
ক. [math]x=-2 y[/math]
খ. [math]x+y=0[/math]
গ. [math]x+y=1[/math]
ঘ. [math]x+y=-1[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{x}{a}+\frac{y}{a}=1 \Rightarrow x+y=a[/math]
 রেখাটি [math]= (-2,1)[/math]
 বিন্দুগামী হলে, [math]a = −1[/math]
অতএব, রেখাটির সমীকরণ [math]→ x + y = -1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #794 (ID: 470229)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](4, – 1)[/math] বিন্দুগামী এবং [math]2x + y = 4[/math] সরলরেখার উপর লম্ব রেখাটির সমীকরণ হচ্ছে-

Options:
ক. [math]x-2 y-6=0[/math]
খ. [math]x+2 y-6=0[/math]
গ. [math]x+2 y+6=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]x-2 y+6=0[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]2 x+y-4=0[/math]
 রেখার উপর লম্ব রেখার সমীকরণ [math]2 y-x+k=0[/math]
 [math](4, − 1 )[/math]
 বিন্দুগামী হলে, [math]\Rightarrow-2-4+\mathrm{k}=0 \Rightarrow \mathrm{k}=6 \therefore[/math]
 সমীকরণ [math]x-2 y-6=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #795 (ID: 470230)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathbf{r}=\mathbf{a} \sqrt{\cos 2 \theta}[/math] এর কার্তেসীয় সমীকরণ-

Options:
A. [math]\left(x^{2}+y^{2}\right)^{2}=a\left(x^{2}-y^{2}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\left(x^{2}-y^{2}\right)^{2}=a\left(x^{2}+y^{2}\right)[/math]
C. [math]\left(x^{2}+y^{2}\right)^{2}=a^{2}\left(x^{2}-y^{2}\right)[/math]
D. [math]\left(x^{2}-y^{2}\right)^{2}=a^{2}\left(x^{2}+y^{2}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]r=a \sqrt{\cos 2 \theta}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow r^{2}=a^{2} \cos 2 \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}+y^{2}=a^{2}[/math]
 [math]\left(\cos ^{2} \theta-\sin ^{2} \theta\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(x^{2}+y^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=a^{2}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{x^{2}}{r^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{r^{2}}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow r^{2}\left(x^{2}+y^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=a^{2}\left(x^{2}-y^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(x^{2}+y^{2}\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]=a^{2}\left(x^{2}-y^{2}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #796 (ID: 470231)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2008-2009, 2017-2018, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]ABC[/math] ত্রিভুজের শীর্ষবিন্দুগুলির স্থানাঙ্ক যথাক্রমে [math]A (0, 0), B(1, 5 )[/math] এবং [math]C (- 2, 2)[/math] হলে A বিন্দুগামী [math]BC[/math] রেখার উপর লম্বের সমীকরণ নির্ণয় কর।

Options:
ক. [math]2 x=y[/math]
খ. [math]x+y=0[/math]
গ. [math]3 x+5 y=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]x+5 y=2[/math]
ঙ. [math]7 x+y=3[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ঢাল [math]\mathrm{BC}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{5-2}{1-2}=1[/math]
 [math]\therefore e q^{\mathrm{n}}, \mathrm{y}-0[/math]
 [math]=-1(\mathrm{x}-0)[/math]
 [math]=-\mathrm{x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}+\mathrm{y}[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]


Explanation:

Question #797 (ID: 470232)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের কোন সমীকরণটি [math]\mathbf{r}(1+\cos \theta)=\mathbf{2}[/math] সমীকরণের কার্তেসীয় সমীকরণ-

Options:
ক. [math]y^{2}=4 x-4[/math]
খ. [math]y^{2}=4 x[/math]
গ. [math]y^{2}=x^{2}+4 x-4[/math]
ঘ. [math]y^{2}=4-4 x[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]r(1+\cos \theta)=2 \Rightarrow r+r \cos \theta=2[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow r+x=2 \Rightarrow r=2-x \Rightarrow r^{2}=4-4 x+x^{2} \\\Rightarrow x^{2}+y^{2}=4-4 x+x^{2} \therefore y^{2}=4-4 x\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #798 (ID: 470233)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2017-2018, 2015-2016, 2010-2011, 2007-2008, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit), Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোন বিন্দুর কার্তেসীয় স্থানাঙ্ক (–1, √3) হলে, বিন্দুটির পোলার স্থানাঙ্ক হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]\left(2,120^{\circ}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\left(4,240^{\circ}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\left(0,0^{\circ}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(4,240^{\circ}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]r=\sqrt{(-1)+(\sqrt{3})^{2}}=\sqrt{1+3}=2[/math]
 [math]\theta=\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{\sqrt{3}}{-1}\right)=\pi-\tan ^{-1}(\sqrt{3})=180^{\circ}-60^{\circ}=120^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 পোলার স্থানাঙ্ক [math]=\left(2,120^{\circ}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #799 (ID: 470234)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](-\sqrt{3},-\sqrt{3})[/math] এর পোলার স্থানাঙ্ক কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\left(6, \frac{\pi}{4}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\left(\sqrt{3}, \frac{\pi}{4}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\left(\sqrt{6}, \frac{5 \pi}{4}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(6,-\frac{\pi}{4}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]r=\sqrt{(-\sqrt{3})^{2}+(-\sqrt{3})^{2}}=\sqrt{3+3}=\sqrt{6}[/math]
এবং [math]\theta=\pi+\tan ^{-1}\left|-\frac{\sqrt{3}}{\Gamma}\right|=\pi+\tan ^{-1} 1=\pi+\frac{\pi}{4}=\frac{5 \pi}{4}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 কার্তেসীয় স্থানাঙ্ক [math]=\left(\sqrt{6}, \frac{5 \pi}{4}\right)[/math]


Explanation:

– 2) এবং (6, 4) বিন্দুদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী দূরত্ব কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{65}[/math]
খ. [math]3\sqrt{5}[/math]

ঘ. [math]3\sqrt{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
মধ্যবর্তী দূরত্ব = [math]=\sqrt{(3-6)^{2}+(-2-4)^{2}}=3 \sqrt{5}[/math]

Question #801 (ID: 470236)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](1, 2)[/math] বিন্দুগামী এবং [math]3x – 4y + 8 = 0[/math] রেখার সমান্তরাল রেখার সমীকরণ-

Options:
ক. [math]3 x-4 y+5=0[/math]
খ. [math]3 x-4 y+7=0[/math]
গ. [math]3 x-4 y-5=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]3 x-4 y-7=0[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]3 x-4 y=3 \times 1-4 \times 2=-5[/math]

Question #802 (ID: 470237)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2x – 5y + 9 = 0[/math] ও [math]5ax + 8by = 15[/math] একই সরলরেখা নির্দেশ করলে [math]a[/math] ও [math]b[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]a=-\frac{2}{3}, b=\frac{25}{24}[/math]
খ. [math]a=\frac{2}{3}, b=\frac{25}{24}[/math]
গ. [math]a=\frac{3}{2}, b=-\frac{25}{24}[/math]
ঘ. [math]a=-\frac{3}{2}, b=-\frac{25}{24}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{2}{5 a}=\frac{-5}{8 b}=\frac{9}{-15} \Rightarrow a=-\frac{2}{3}, b=\frac{25}{24}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #803 (ID: 470238)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
(0,0) বিন্দু থেকে [math]x + y = 1[/math] রেখার সর্বনিম্ন দূরত্ব কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]1[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
সর্বনিম্ন দূরত্ব = লম্ব দূরত্ব: [math]=\left|\frac{0+0-1}{\sqrt{1^{2}+1^{2}}}\right|=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #804 (ID: 470239)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
মূলবিন্দু থেকে [math]4[/math]একক দূরবর্তী এবং [math]– 1[/math] ঢাল বিশিষ্ট সরলরেখার সমীকরণ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]y+x \pm 4 \sqrt{2}=0[/math]
খ. [math]y-x \pm 4 \sqrt{2}=0[/math]
গ. [math]y+4 \sqrt{2} x=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]4 \sqrt{2} x-y=0[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=m x+c \quad \because m=-1 \quad \therefore x+y+c=0[/math]
(0,0) বিন্দু হতে [math]\left|\frac{\mathrm{c}}{\sqrt{1^{2}+1^{2}}}\right|=4 \quad \therefore \mathrm{c}=\pm 4 \sqrt{2} \quad \therefore \mathrm{x}+\mathrm{y} \pm 4 \sqrt{2}=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #805 (ID: 470240)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]3x + 6y + 3 = 0[/math] এবং [math]3x + 6y + 6 = 0[/math] সমান্তরাল সরলরেখাদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী দূরত্ব কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{5}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{5}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\frac{6-3}{\sqrt{3^{2}+6^{2}}}=\frac{1}{\sqrt{5}}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #807 (ID: 470219)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি সরলরেখা X অক্ষের সাথে 225° কোণ উৎপন্ন করে। রেখাটি দ্বারা Y অক্ষ থেকে কর্তিত অংশের পরিমাণ 2 হলে, এর সমীরকণ কী?

Options:
ক. y = 2 - x
খ. y = x - 2
গ. y = x + 2
ঘ. y = x


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=x \tan 225^{\circ}+2 \therefore y=x+2[/math]

Explanation:

Question #808 (ID: 470220)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Pabna University of Science and Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x^{3}-7 x^{2}+5 x[/math] বক্ররেখার ( 5, 4 ) বিন্দুতে ঢাল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]14[/math]
খ. [math]12[/math]
গ. [math]10[/math]
ঘ. [math]9[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\left.\frac{d y}{d x}\right|_{x=5}[/math]
 [math]=3 x^{2}-\left.14 x\right|_{x=5}[/math]
 [math]=3(5)^{2}-14.5[/math]
 [math]=10[/math]


Explanation:

Question #810 (ID: 470223)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y = mx + c[/math] রেখাটির যে কোন বিন্দু থেকে [math](0, 3)[/math] এবং [math](0, 4 )[/math] বিন্দুর দূরত্ব সমান হলে রেখাটির জন্য নীচের কোনটি সত্য?

Options:
ক. y অক্ষের সমান্তরাল
খ. m = 1
গ. c = 1
ঘ. x অক্ষের সমান্তরাল


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
ধরি, রেখাটির উপর একটি বিন্দু [math]\mathrm{P}(\mathrm{x}, \mathrm{y})[/math]
শর্তমতে [math]\sqrt{(x-0)^{2}+(y-3)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{(x-0)^{2}+(y+4)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y^{2}-6 y+9[/math]
 [math]=y^{2}+8 y+16[/math]
 [math]\therefore y=\frac{-1}{2}[/math]
 যা x অক্ষের সমান্তরাল

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

ক. [math]5[/math]
খ. [math]2[/math]
গ. [math]1[/math]
ঘ. [math]0[/math]

Question #813 (ID: 470217)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
মূলবিন্দুগামী এবং X অক্ষের ধনাত্মক দিকের সাথে [math]\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)[/math] কোণ উৎপন্ন

করে এমন রেখার সমীকরণ-

Options:
ক. [math]2 y+\sqrt{3} x=0[/math]
খ. [math]\sqrt{3} x-y=0[/math]
গ. [math]\sqrt{3} y+2 x=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{3} y-2 x=0[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\theta=\cos ^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{2}\right) \Rightarrow \theta=\cos ^{-1}\left(\cos 60^{\circ}\right)=60^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 নির্ণেয় সরলরেখা : [math]y=\tan 60^{\circ} x \Rightarrow y=\sqrt{3} x \therefore \sqrt{3} x-y=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { If } y=3 x-4 \text { is a tangent and touches the circle at } P(2,2) \text {. } Q \text { is the center of the circle then slope of }[/math] [math]\text { diameter directed towards } P \text { is- }[/math]


[Image]


Options:
A. [math]-\frac{1}{3}[/math]
B. [math]3[/math]
C. [math]\frac{3}{4}[/math]
D. [math]-3[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\text { Diameter } \perp \text { tangent }[y=3 x-4][/math]
 [math]m_{\text {tangent }}=3 ; m_{\text {diameter }}=-\frac{1}{3}\left(m_{1} m_{2}=-1\right)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #817 (ID: 470202)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Sher-e-Bangla Agricultural University, Chattogram Veterinary and Animal Sciences University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোন বিন্দুর কার্তেসিয় স্থানাঙ্ক [math](-1, \sqrt{3})[/math] হলে বিন্দুটির পোলার স্থানাঙ্ক কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\left(2, \frac{\pi}{3}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\left(2,-\frac{\pi}{3}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\left(2, \frac{2 \pi}{3}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(4, \frac{2 \pi}{3}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]r=\sqrt{(-1)^{2}+(\sqrt{3})^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=2[/math]
এবং [math]\theta=\pi-\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
$=120^{\circ}[math]\therefore(r, \theta)[/math]
 [math]=\left(2,120^{\circ}\right)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #818 (ID: 470203)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কার্তেসীয় সমতলে একটি বিন্দুর স্থানাঙ্ক [math](1,− 1 )[/math] হলে, এর পোলার স্থানাঙ্ক কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\left(2, \frac{\pi}{4}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\left(1, \frac{\pi}{3}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\left(\sqrt{2},-\frac{\pi}{4}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(2, \frac{\pi}{3}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]r=[/math]
 [math]\sqrt{1^{2}+(-1)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{2}[/math]
 [math]\theta=[/math]
 [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{-1}{1}\right)[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Sylhet Agricultural University
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](K, 2),(0,5)[/math] এবং [math](2 – K, 3)[/math] বিন্দুত্রয় সমরেখ হলে [math]K[/math] এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]-13[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{6}{5}[/math]
গ. [math]-9[/math]
ঘ. [math]-19[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{5-2}{0-K}=\frac{3-5}{2-K} \Rightarrow \frac{3}{K}=\frac{-2}{K-2} \Rightarrow K=\frac{6}{5}[/math]

Question #821 (ID: 470206)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2020-2021, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Agriculture Cluster Admission System, Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x+4[/math] এবং [math]y=x[/math] রেখাদ্বয়ের লম্ব দূরত্ব -

Options:
ক. 4 একক
খ. [math]2 \sqrt{2}[/math] একক
গ. 2 একক
ঘ. [math]4 \sqrt{2}[/math] একক


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=x+4 \Rightarrow x-y+4=0[/math]
এবং [math]y=x \Rightarrow x-y+0=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেখাদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী দূরত্ব = [math]\left|\frac{4-0}{\sqrt{1^{2}+(-1)^{2}}}\right|=\frac{4}{\sqrt{2}}=2 \sqrt{2}[/math]
 একক।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #822 (ID: 470207)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2022-2023, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 x+3 y-4=0[/math] এবং [math]x \cos \alpha+y \sin \alpha=p[/math] একই সরলরেখা নিদের্শ করলে p এর মান-

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{13}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{13}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{3}{\sqrt{13}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{4}{\sqrt{13}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
প্রদত্ত রেখাদ্বয় একই,[math]\begin{array}{l}\therefore \frac{\cos \alpha}{2}=\frac{\sin \alpha}{3}=\frac{\mathrm{P}}{4} \Rightarrow \cos \alpha=\frac{\mathrm{P}}{2}, \sin \alpha=\frac{3 \mathrm{P}}{4} \\\Rightarrow \cos ^{2} \alpha+\sin ^{2} \alpha=\frac{\mathrm{P}^{2}}{4}+\frac{9 \mathrm{P}^{2}}{16} \Rightarrow \mathrm{P}^{2}\left(\frac{4+9}{16}\right)=1 \\\Rightarrow \mathrm{P}^{2}=\frac{16}{13} \therefore \mathrm{P}=\frac{4}{\sqrt{13}}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #823 (ID: 470208)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2022-2023, 2022-2023, 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2012-2013, 2012-2013, 2005-2006, 2002-2003 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x অক্ষ ও [math](−5, –7)[/math] থেকে [math](4, k)[/math] বিন্দুটির দূরত্ব সমান হলে, k এর মান -

Options:
ক. 5/7
খ. 65/7
গ. -25/7
ঘ. -65/7


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
প্রশ্নমতে, [math]k[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{(4+5)^{2}+(k+7)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow k^{2}=81+k^{2}+14 k+49[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 14 k[/math]
 [math]=-81-49[/math]
 [math]=-130[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow k[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{130}{14}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{65}{7}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #824 (ID: 470209)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](− 1, 3)[/math] এবং [math](4, – 2 )[/math] বিন্দুগামী সরলরেখা হতে অক্ষ দুটির মধ্যবর্তী খণ্ডিত অংশটুকুর দৈর্ঘ্য কত?

Options:
ক. 2
খ. [math]\frac{4}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\sqrt{7}[/math]
ঘ. [math]2 \sqrt{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math](–1, 3 )[/math]
 এবং [math](4, −2)[/math]
 বিন্দুগামী সরলরেখার সমীকরণ [math]\frac{x+1}{-1-4}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y-3}{3+2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{x+1}{-5}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y-3}{5}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x+y=2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{x}{2}+\frac{y}{2}[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 অক্ষদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী অংশ = [math]=\sqrt{(2)^{2}+(2)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{4+4}[/math]
 [math]=2 \sqrt{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #825 (ID: 470210)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x-অক্ষ এবং [math](– 5, – 7 )[/math] বিন্দু থেকে [math]( 4, a)[/math] বিন্দুটির দূরত্ব সমান হলে, a-এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{7}{65}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{65}{7}[/math]
গ. [math]-\frac{7}{65}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\frac{65}{7}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]a^{2}=(4+5)^{2}[/math]
 [math]+(a+7)^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a^{2}[/math]
 [math]=81+a^{2}+14 a+49[/math]
 [math]\therefore a=-\frac{65}{7}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #827 (ID: 470213)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2015-2016, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (C Unit), Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (C Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
– 2) এবং (6, 4) বিন্দুদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী দূরত্ব কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{65}[/math]
খ. [math]3\sqrt{5}[/math]
গ. [math]\sqrt{6}[/math]
ঘ. [math]3\sqrt{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
মধ্যবর্তী দূরত্ব = [math]=\sqrt{(3-6)^{2}+(-2-4)^{2}}=3 \sqrt{5}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #828 (ID: 470214)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2015-2016, 2006-2007 | Boards:  | Tags: Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
P(3, 4) এবং Q (5, 9) বিন্দুদ্বয়ের সংযোগ রেখাংশকে যে বিন্দুটি 2:3 . অনুপাতে বহির্বিভক্ত করে এর স্থানাঙ্ক-

Options:
ক. (1,-6)
খ. /9-1,6)
গ. (-1,-6)
ঘ. (1,6)


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\left(\frac{5 \times 2-3 \times 3}{2-3}, \frac{2 \times 9-3 \times 4}{2-3}\right) \equiv(-1,-6)[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #829 (ID: 470197)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]ABCD[/math] একটি সামন্তরিক। [math]BD[/math] এর দৈর্ঘ্য 2। [math]BCD[/math] ত্রিভুজের সকল কোণ সমান। সামন্তরিকটির পরিসীমা কত?


[Image]


Options:
ক. [math]3 \sqrt{3}[/math]
খ. [math]8[/math]
গ. [math]9 \sqrt{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]12[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
বর্ণনা অনুযায়ী [math]BCD[/math]
 একটি সমবাহু ত্রিভুজ এবং [math]ABC[/math]
 একটি রম্বস যার প্রতিবাহু 2 একক, তাই পরিসীমা ৪ একক।

Explanation:

Question #830 (ID: 470198)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
মূলবিন্দু দিয়ে যায় এবং [math]3y = 2x[/math] রেখার সাথে [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)[/math] কোণ উৎপন্ন করে এরূপ দুইটি সরলরেখার সমীকরণ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]y=\frac{2}{3} x, y=\frac{1}{8} x[/math]
খ. [math]y=\frac{1}{3} x, y=\frac{2}{5} x[/math]
গ. [math]y=\frac{3}{2} x, y=\frac{7}{4} x[/math]
ঘ. [math]y=\frac{7}{4} x, y=\frac{1}{8} x[/math]
ঙ. [math]y=\frac{1}{3} x, y=\frac{3}{5} x[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{1}{2}=\pm \frac{\frac{2}{3}-m}{1+\frac{2 m}{3}} ;(+v e)[/math]
 নিয়ে পাই [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{m}=\frac{1}{8} ;(-\mathrm{ve})[/math]
 নিয়ে পাই [math]\Rightarrow \mathrm{m}=\frac{7}{4} \therefore \mathrm{y}=\frac{1}{8} \mathrm{x}[/math]
 ও [math]y=\frac{7}{4} x[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #831 (ID: 470199)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Islamic University of Technology, Islamic University of Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\text { For what value of } K \text { will the three lines } x-y+5=0, x+y-1=0 \text {, and } K x-y+13=0 \text { be concurrent? }[/math]

Options:
A. [math]1[/math]
B. [math]5[/math]
C. [math]7[/math]
D. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]x-y+5=0...(i)[/math]
 [math]x+y-1=0....(ii)[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\text{Solving (i) \& (ii) We get, intersecting point } (-2,3)\\\therefore \mathrm{k} \times(-2)-3+13=0 \Rightarrow \mathrm{k}=5\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #832 (ID: 470195)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2x + 3y – 1 = 0[/math] এবং [math]x - 2y + 3 = 0[/math] রেখাদ্বয়ের অন্তর্ভুক্ত সূক্ষ্মকোণ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(\pm \frac{7}{4}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(\pm \frac{3}{4}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(\pm \frac{3}{2}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(\pm \frac{2}{3}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\theta=\tan ^{-1}\left(\pm \frac{-\frac{2}{3}}{1+\left(-\frac{2}{3}\right)\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)}\right)=\tan ^{-1}\left(\pm \frac{7}{4}\right)[/math]
 প্রশ্নে বলা সূক্ষ্মকোণ, যা আসলে [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{7}{4}\right)[/math]
 । যদি বলাথাকতো, অন্তর্ভুক্ত কোণ কত, তাহলে উত্তর হতো [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(\pm \frac{7}{4}\right)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #835 (ID: 470183)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2018-2019, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](3,-1)[/math] স্থানাঙ্ক- এবং [math](5,2)[/math] বিন্দুদ্বয়ের সংযোগকারী সরলরেখাকে 3:4 অনুপাতে বহিঃস্থভাবে বিভক্তকারী বিন্দুর স্থানাঙ্ক (x,y)

Options:
ক. [math]\left(\frac{17}{3}, 3\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\left(\frac{27}{7}, \frac{2}{7}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\left(\frac{27}{4}, \frac{4}{3}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\text { None }[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
বহিঃস্থভাবে বিভক্ত করায় [math]x=\frac{3 \times 5-4 \times 3}{3-4}=-3 ; y=\frac{3 \times 2-4 \times(-1)}{3-4}=-10[/math]

Explanation:

Question #836 (ID: 470184)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2006-2007, 2003-2004, 2019-2020, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2012-2013, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Mymensingh Board, Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Mymensingh Board, Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
- (-2, 1) বিন্দু হতে 4x - 3y + 1 = 0 সরলরেখার উপর অঙ্কিত লম্বের দৈর্ঘ্য-

Options:
ক. 1
খ. -2
গ. 2
ঘ. 3


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
লম্বের দৈর্ঘ্য = [math]=\left|\frac{4(-2)-3.1+1}{\sqrt{16+9}}\right|=\left|\frac{-10}{5}\right|=2[/math]

Explanation:

Question #837 (ID: 470185)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2021-2022, 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: General and Science Technology (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), Mymensingh Board, Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
4y = 3 (x – 4) এবং 4y = 3 (x - 1 ) রেখা দুইটির মধ্যবর্তী দূরত্ব-

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{9}{4}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{9}{5}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{15}{8}[/math]
ঘ. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{r}4 y=3(x-4) \Rightarrow 3 x-4 y=12 \\4 y=3(x-1) \Rightarrow 3 x-4 y=3\end{array}[/math]
রেখাদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী দূরত্ব= [math]\left|\frac{12-3}{\sqrt{3^{3}+(-4)^{2}}}\right|=\left|\frac{9}{5}\right|=\frac{9}{5}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #838 (ID: 470186)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]( x + y − 1 )[/math] এবং [math]( 3, x - y)[/math] ক্রমজোড় দুটি সমান হলে [math](x, y)[/math] এর মান হবে-

Options:
ক. [math](2,1)[/math]
খ. [math](0,3)[/math]
গ. [math](3,-1)[/math]
ঘ. [math](1,2)[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
প্রশ্নমতে [math]\begin{array}{l}x+y=3 \\x-y=-1 \\\hline 2 x=2\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=1 \text { and } y=2[/math]
 [math]\therefore(x, y)=(1,2)[/math]
 [math]\\[/math]
 [math]\boxed {\mathrm {Another\ Solution} }[/math]
 [math]x+y=3[/math]
 [math]\ldots \ldots \text { (i) },[/math]
 [math]x-y=-1[/math]
 [math]\ldots \ldots \text { (ii) }[/math]
 [math]\text{(i) + (ii) }[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 x=2[/math]
 [math]\therefore x=1[/math]
 [math]\text{(i) - (ii) }[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 y=4[/math]
 [math]\therefore y=2[/math]
 [math]\therefore(x, y)\equiv(1,2)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #839 (ID: 470187)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
মূলবিন্দু থেকে সরলরেখাসমূহের দূরত্ব 7 এবং 3x – 4y + 7 = 0 বক্ররেখার উপর লম্ব। রেখাসমূহের সমীকরণ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]4 x+3 y-35=0[/math]
খ. [math]3 x-4 y+35=0[/math]
গ. [math]4 x-3 y= \pm 35[/math]
ঘ. [math]4 x+3 y+35=0[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]4 x+3 y \pm 7 \sqrt{3^{2}+4^{2}}=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 নির্ণেয় রেখাসমূহ [math]4 x+3 y \pm 35=0[/math]


Explanation:

Question #840 (ID: 470188)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
a এর কোন মানের জন্য [math]x-3 y+2=0 ; x-6 y+3=0 ; x+a y=0[/math] রেখা তিনটি সমবিন্দু হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]10[/math]
খ. [math]11[/math]
গ. [math]13[/math]
ঘ. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
১ম ১টি রেখার ছেদবিন্দু [math]\left(-1, \frac{1}{3}\right) \therefore-1+\frac{1}{3} a=0 \Rightarrow a=3[/math]

Question #842 (ID: 470190)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x-অক্ষ এবং [math](– 5, – 7 )[/math] বিন্দু থেকে [math]( 4, a)[/math] বিন্দুটির দূরত্ব সমান হলে, a-এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{7}{65}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{65}{7}[/math]
গ. [math]-\frac{7}{65}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\frac{65}{7}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]a^{2}=(4+5)^{2}[/math]
 [math]+(a+7)^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a^{2}[/math]
 [math]=81+a^{2}+14 a+49[/math]
 [math]\therefore a=-\frac{65}{7}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #843 (ID: 470191)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি সরলরেখা অক্ষদ্বয়ের সাথে [math]\frac{50}{\sqrt{3}}[/math] বর্গ একক ক্ষেত্রফল বিশিষ্ট একটি ত্রিভুজ গঠন করে এবং মূলবিন্দু হতে রেখাটির উপর অঙ্কিত লম্ব x অক্ষের সাথে [math]30°[/math] কোণ উৎপন্ন করে। রেখাটির সমীকরণ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{3} x+y=10[/math]
খ. [math]x+\sqrt{3} y=10[/math]
গ. [math]10 x+y=\sqrt{3}[/math]
ঘ. [math]x+10 y=\sqrt{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
ধরি রেখাটি হবে [math]x \cos 30^{\circ}+y \sin 30^{\circ}=p[/math]
 আবার, [math]\frac{x}{a}+\frac{y}{b}=1 \therefore a=\frac{2 p}{\sqrt{3}}, b=2 p[/math]
আবার, [math]\frac{1}{2} a b=\frac{50}{\sqrt{3}} \Rightarrow \frac{4 p^{2}}{\sqrt{3}}=\frac{100}{\sqrt{3}} \Rightarrow p=5[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 সমীকরন [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2} x+\frac{1}{2} y=5 \Rightarrow \sqrt{3} x+y=10[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

ক. [math]3 x-2 y=0[/math]
খ. [math]2 x-3 y=0[/math]
গ. [math]2 x-3 y-1=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]2 x+3 y=0[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]3 x-2 y=3(0)-2(0)=0[/math]

Question #848 (ID: 470168)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি বিন্দুতে কার্তেসীয় স্থানাঙ্ক (4,a) ও পোলার স্থানাঙ্ক (5,b) হলে বিন্দুটি থেকে x অক্ষের উপর লম্বের দৈর্ঘ্য কত?

Options:
ক. 5
খ. 3
গ. 4
ঘ. [math]\frac{4}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:

[Image]
চিত্র হতে পাই, [math]4^{2}+a^{2}=5^{2} \Rightarrow a^{2}=5^{2}-4^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a^{2}=25-16=9 \therefore a=3[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 x হতে বিন্দুটির দূরত্ব = 3

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #849 (ID: 470169)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit), Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](-\sqrt{3},-\sqrt{3})[/math] এর পোলার স্থানাঙ্ক কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\left(6, \frac{\pi}{4}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\left(\sqrt{3}, \frac{\pi}{4}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\left(\sqrt{6}, \frac{5 \pi}{4}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(6,-\frac{\pi}{4}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]r=\sqrt{(-\sqrt{3})^{2}+(-\sqrt{3})^{2}}=\sqrt{3+3}=\sqrt{6}[/math]
এবং [math]\theta=\pi+\tan ^{-1}\left|-\frac{\sqrt{3}}{\Gamma}\right|=\pi+\tan ^{-1} 1=\pi+\frac{\pi}{4}=\frac{5 \pi}{4}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 কার্তেসীয় স্থানাঙ্ক [math]=\left(\sqrt{6}, \frac{5 \pi}{4}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #850 (ID: 470170)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Mymensingh Board, Mymensingh Board, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কার্তেসীয় স্থানাঙ্ক [math](-1,-\sqrt{3})[/math] হইলে পোলার স্থানাঙ্ক কত? (যখন [math]r \geq 0[/math] এবং [math]\theta \in[0,2 \pi][/math] অথবা [math]\theta \in[-\pi, \pi])[/math]

Options:
ক. [math]\left(2, \frac{4 \pi}{3}\right) \text { or }\left(2,-\frac{2 \pi}{3}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\left(1, \frac{4 \pi}{3}\right) \text { or }\left(2,-\frac{4 \pi}{3}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\left(-1, \frac{4 \pi}{3}\right) \text { or }\left(2,-\frac{4 \pi}{3}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(3, \frac{4 \pi}{3}\right) \text { or }\left(3,-\frac{4 \pi}{3}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]r=\sqrt{(-1)^{2}+(-\sqrt{3})^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{1+3}=\sqrt{4}=2[/math]
 [math]\theta=\pi+\tan ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\left|\frac{-\sqrt{3}}{-1}\right|[/math]
 [math]=\pi+\tan ^{-1} \sqrt{3}[/math]
 [math]=\pi+\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4 \pi}{3}[/math]
এবং [math]\theta=-\pi+\tan ^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\left|\frac{-\sqrt{3}}{-1}\right|[/math]
 [math]=-\pi+\tan ^{-1} \sqrt{3}=-\pi+\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{2 \pi}{3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 পোলার স্থানাঙ্ক [math]=\left(2, \frac{4 \pi}{3}\right),[/math]
 [math]\left(2,-\frac{2 \pi}{3}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #851 (ID: 470171)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](1,-\sqrt{3})[/math] এর পোলার স্থানাঙ্ক কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\left(5,-\frac{\pi}{4}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\left(-2, \frac{\pi}{4}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\left(2, \frac{5 \pi}{3}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(2, \frac{\pi}{4}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\mathrm{r}=\sqrt{1^{2}+(-\sqrt{3})^{2}}=2[/math]
 [math]\theta=2 \pi-\tan ^{-1}\left|\frac{-\sqrt{3}}{1}\right|=2 \pi-\tan ^{-1} \sqrt{3}=2 \pi-\frac{\pi}{3}=\frac{5 \pi}{3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 পোলার স্থানাঙ্ক [math]=\left(2, \frac{5 \pi}{3}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

(7, 7 ) এবং ( 5, 10 ) বিন্দু দুইটির সংযোগ রেখাংশ y অক্ষকে কোন অনুপাতে ছেদ করে?

Options:
ক. 7:10
খ. 10:7
গ. 7:5
ঘ. D5:7


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
7:5

Question #853 (ID: 470173)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি A (2, 5), B(5, 6) এবং D(6, 7) বিন্দুত্রয় ABCD রম্বসের তিনটি শীর্ষবিন্দু হয়, তবে C এর স্থানাঙ্ক কোনটি?

Options:
ক. (8, 9)
খ. (9,8)
গ. (4,6)
ঘ. (6,4)


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
C (6 + 5 - 2,7 + 6 - 5) = (9, 8)

Explanation:

Question #854 (ID: 470174)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি (n, 21 ), (2, 9) এবং ( 1, 0) বিন্দু তিনটি k সরলরেখার মধ্যে অবস্থান করে, তবে। এর মান-

Options:
ক. 6
খ. 7
গ. 8
ঘ. 9


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
শর্তমতে, [math]\frac{9-21}{2-n}=\frac{0-9}{-1-2} \Rightarrow \frac{-12}{2-n}=\frac{-9}{-3}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 6-3 n=-12 \Rightarrow-3 n=-18 \therefore n=6[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #855 (ID: 470175)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
( 3, 2) ও (-3,2) বিন্দুদ্বয়ের সংযোগকারী রেখার সমীকরণ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. y=-3
খ. y=3
গ. y=2
ঘ. y=-2


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}\frac{x-3}{3-(-3)}=\frac{y-2}{2-2} \Rightarrow \frac{x-3}{6}=\frac{y-2}{0} \\\Rightarrow y-2=0 \therefore y=2\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #856 (ID: 470176)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x + y = 0 সরলরেখাটি x-অক্ষের সাথে কত কোণ উৎপন্ন করে?

Options:
ক. 35°
খ. 45°
গ. 115°
ঘ. 135°


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]x+y=0 \Rightarrow y=-x \therefore[/math]
 কোণ [math]=\tan (-1)=135^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:

Question #857 (ID: 470177)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\frac{13}{2}[/math] ঢালবিশিষ্ট সরলরেখার উপর লম্ব এবং (− 3, 1) বিন্দুগামী সরলরেখার সমীকরণ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. 2x - 13y + 7 = 0
খ. 2x + 13y - 7 = 0
গ. 13x - 2y + 7 = 0
ঘ. 13x+2y+7=0


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
সরলরেখা [math]y-1=-\frac{2}{13}(x+3)\because[[/math]
 এর ঢাল [math]\left.=-\frac{2}{13}\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 13 y-13=-2 x \therefore 2 x+13 y-7=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #858 (ID: 470178)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
2x + 3y + 1 = 0, x = 0, y = 0 রেখা তিনটি দ্বারা আবদ্ধ এলাকার ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{12}[/math]
খ. 12
গ. [math]\frac{1}{6}[/math]
ঘ. 6


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]2 x+3 y=1 \Rightarrow \frac{x}{-\frac{1}{2}}+\frac{y}{-\frac{1}{3}}=1[/math]
আবদ্ধ ক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল = [math]=\frac{1}{2}\left|\left(-\frac{1}{2}\right)\left(-\frac{1}{3}\right)\right|=\frac{1}{12}[/math]
 বর্গ একক।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #859 (ID: 470166)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y = x[/math] এবং [math]2x + 1 = 0[/math] রেখাদ্বয়ের অন্তর্ভূক্ত কোণ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]0^{\circ}[/math]
খ. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]
গ. [math]60^{\circ}[/math]
ঘ. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=x[/math]
 রেখার ঢাল, [math]\tan \theta_{1}=1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেখাটি x অক্ষের ধনাত্মক দিকের সাথে [math]\theta_{1}=\tan ^{-1}(1)=45^{\circ}[/math]
 কোণ উৎপন্ন করে। -[math]2 x+1=0[/math]
 রেখার ঢাল [math]\tan \theta_{2}=\infty[/math]

[Image]
[math]\therefore[/math]
 রেখাটি x অক্ষের ধনাত্মক দিকের সাথে [math]\theta_{2}=\tan ^{-1}(\infty)=90^{\circ}[/math]
 কোণ উৎপন্ন করে।[math]\therefore[/math]
 রেখাদ্বয়ের অন্তর্ভুক্ত কোণ [math]=45^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #860 (ID: 470167)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]r \cos ^{2} \theta+\cos \theta-r=0[/math] সমীকরণ দ্বারা সূচিত বক্ররেখা একটি-

Options:
ক. বৃত্ত
খ. উপবৃত্ত
গ. অর্ধবৃত্ত
ঘ. পরাবৃত্ত


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]r \cos ^{2} \theta+\cos \theta-r=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow r \cdot \frac{x^{2}}{r^{2}}+\frac{x}{r}-r=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{x^{2}}{r}+\frac{x}{r}=r[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{x^{2}+x}{r}=r[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}+x=r^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}+x=x^{2}+y^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y^{2}=x[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y^{2}=4[/math]
 [math]\cdot \frac{1}{4} \cdot x[/math]
 [যা একটি পরাবৃত্তের সমীকরণ]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #861 (ID: 470165)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]3 x+4 y=12[/math] রেখাটি x অক্ষকে [math]A[/math] এবং [math]Y[/math] অক্ষকে [math]B[/math] বিন্দুতে ছেদ করে। [math]AB[/math] এর দৈর্ঘ্য কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]5[/math]
খ. [math]4[/math]
গ. [math]6[/math]
ঘ. [math]8[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:

[Image]
[math]3 x+4 y=12 \Rightarrow \frac{x}{4}+\frac{y}{3}=1[/math]
 [math]\therefore A B[/math]
 রেখাংশের দৈর্ঘ্য [math]=\sqrt{(4)^{2}+(3)^{2}}=5[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #862 (ID: 470163)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y = x[/math] এবং [math]2x + 1 = 0[/math] রেখাদ্বয়ের অন্তর্ভূক্ত কোণ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]0^{\circ}[/math]
খ. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]
গ. [math]60^{\circ}[/math]
ঘ. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y = x[/math]
 রেখার ঢাল [math]\tan \theta_{1}=1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেখাটি x অক্ষের ধনাত্মক দিকের সাথে [math]\theta_{1}=\tan ^{-1}(1)=45^{\circ}[/math]
 কোণ উৎপন্ন করে।2x+1=0 রেখার ঢাল [math]\tan \theta_{2}=\infty[/math]

[Image]
[math]\therefore[/math]
 রেখাটি x অক্ষের ধনাত্মক দিকের সাথে [math]\theta_{2}=\tan ^{-1}(\infty)=90^{\circ}[/math]
 কোণ উৎপন্ন করে।[math]\therefore[/math]
 রেখাদ্বয়ের অন্তর্ভুক্ত কোণ [math]= 45°[/math]


Explanation:

Question #863 (ID: 470164)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 x+3 y+6=0[/math] রেখার উপর লম্বরেখার ঢাল কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{2}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\frac{3}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]2 x+3 y+6=0[/math]
 রেখার ঢাল, [math]m_{1}=\frac{-x এর সহগ}{y এর সহগ}=-\frac{2}{3}[/math]
ধরি, [math]2 x+3 y+6=0[/math]
 রেখার উপর লম্ব রেখার ঢাল, [math]\mathrm{m}_{2}[/math]
আমরা জানি, দুটি রেখা পরস্পর লম্ব হলে রেখাদ্বয়ের ঢালদ্বয়ের গুণফল [math]= -1[/math]
 [math]\therefore m_{1} \times m_{2}=-1 \Rightarrow-\frac{2}{3} \times m_{2}=-1 \Rightarrow m_{2}=\frac{3}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #864 (ID: 470156)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Agriculture Cluster Admission System
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]3x + 4y = 12[/math] রেখাটি x অক্ষকে A এবং [math]Y[/math] অক্ষকে [math]B[/math] বিন্দুতে ছেদ করে। [math]AB[/math] এর দৈর্ঘ্য কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]5[/math]
খ. [math]4[/math]
গ. [math]6[/math]
ঘ. [math]8[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:

[Image]
[math]3 x+4 y=12 \Rightarrow \frac{x}{4}+\frac{y}{3}=1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{AB}[/math]
 রেখাংশের দৈর্ঘ্য [math]=\sqrt{(4)^{2}+(3)^{2}}=5[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #865 (ID: 470157)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2007-2008, 2019-2020, 2008-2009, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Bangladesh University of Textiles, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=1+\frac{1}{2+x}[/math] বক্ররেখা x অক্ষকে A বিন্দুতে এবং y অক্ষকে B বিন্দুতে ছেদ করলে AB সরলরেখার সমীকরণ নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. x+2y+3=0
খ. x+2y-3=
গ. x-2y+3=0
ঘ. x-2y-3=0


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
x অক্ষে [math]y=0 \therefore 0=1+\frac{1}{2+x} \Rightarrow x=-3[/math]
y অক্ষে [math]x=0 \therefore y=1+\frac{1}{2}=\frac{3}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 A ও B বিন্দুর স্থানাঙ্ক যথাক্রমে (-3,0) ও [math]\left(0, \frac{3}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 AB এর সমীকরণ [math]\frac{x}{-3}+\frac{y}{\frac{3}{2}}=1 \Rightarrow x-2 y+3=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #866 (ID: 470158)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011, 1999-2000, 2009-2010, 2020-2021, 2019-2020, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Chittagong (Unit A), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Mymensingh Board, University of Barishal
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি সরলরেখা সমীকরণ নির্ণয় কর যা (2, -3) বিন্দু দিয়ে যায় এবং 2x - 3y = 7 রেখার উপর লম্ব-

Options:
ক. x + 2y = 0
খ. 5x + 2y=13
গ. 3x + 2 y = 0
ঘ. 3x + 2y = 12


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
নির্ণয় রেখা, 3(x - 2) + 2(y + 3) = 0.3x + 2y = 0

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #867 (ID: 470159)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2004-2005, 2019-2020, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), University of Barishal
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি সরলরেখার অক্ষদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী অংশ (2, 3) বিন্দুতে সমদ্বিখন্ডিত হয়। সরলরেখাটির সমীকরণ-

Options:
ক. 2x + 3y -12 = 0
খ. B3x + 2y - 12 = 0
গ. 2x + 3y - 6 = 0
ঘ. 3x + 2y - 6 = 0


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{x}{2.2}+\frac{y}{2.3}=1 \Rightarrow 3 x+2 y=12 \therefore 3 x+2 y-12=0[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #868 (ID: 470160)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](− 1, 3)[/math] এবং [math](4, – 2 )[/math] বিন্দুগামী সরলরেখা হতে অক্ষ দুটির মধ্যবর্তী খণ্ডিত অংশটুকুর দৈর্ঘ্য কত?

Options:
ক. 2
খ. [math]\frac{4}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\sqrt{7}[/math]
ঘ. [math]2 \sqrt{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math](–1, 3 )[/math]
 এবং [math](4, −2)[/math]
 বিন্দুগামী সরলরেখার সমীকরণ [math]\frac{x+1}{-1-4}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y-3}{3+2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{x+1}{-5}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y-3}{5}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x+y=2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{x}{2}+\frac{y}{2}[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 অক্ষদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী অংশ = [math]=\sqrt{(2)^{2}+(2)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{4+4}[/math]
 [math]=2 \sqrt{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #869 (ID: 470161)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2019-2020, 2017-2018, 2017-2018, 2015-2016, 2010-2011, 2007-2008, 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Hajee Mohammad Danesh Science & Technology University (A Unit), Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Begum Rokeya University, Rangpur (A Unit), Noakhali Science & Technology University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit), Khulna University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোন বিন্দুর কার্তেসীয় স্থানাঙ্ক (–1, √3) হলে, বিন্দুটির পোলার স্থানাঙ্ক হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]\left(2,120^{\circ}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\left(4,240^{\circ}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\left(0,0^{\circ}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(4,240^{\circ}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]r=\sqrt{(-1)+(\sqrt{3})^{2}}=\sqrt{1+3}=2[/math]
 [math]\theta=\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{\sqrt{3}}{-1}\right)=\pi-\tan ^{-1}(\sqrt{3})=180^{\circ}-60^{\circ}=120^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 পোলার স্থানাঙ্ক [math]=\left(2,120^{\circ}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #870 (ID: 470162)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
ABC ত্রিভুজের একটি বিন্দু A(8, 2) এবং BC বাহুর মধ্যবিন্দু D(5, 2 ) হলে, ত্রিভুজটির ভরকেন্দ্রের স্থানাঙ্ক কোনটি?

Options:
ক. (9,3)
খ. (3,9)
গ. (2,6)
ঘ. (6, 2)


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
ভরকেন্দ্রের অনুপাত 2 : 1[math]\therefore G=\left(\frac{2 \times 5+1 \times 8}{2+1}, \frac{2 \times 2+1 \times 2}{2+1}\right)=(6,2)[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #871 (ID: 470150)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
ABC ত্রিভুজের একটি বিন্দু [math]A(8,2)[/math] এবং BC বাহুর মধ্যবিন্দু [math]D(5,2)[/math] হলে ত্রিভুজটির ভরকেন্দ্রের স্থানাংক কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math](9,3)[/math]
খ. [math](3,9)[/math]
গ. [math](2,6)[/math]
ঘ. [math](6,2)[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{A(8,2) \quad G(x, y) \quad D(5,2)}{2: 1}[/math]
 [math]x=\frac{8 \times 1+5 \times 2}{2+1}=6[/math]
 [math]y=\frac{2 \times 1+2 \times 2}{2+1}[/math]
 [math]=2[/math]
 [math]\therefore G(x, y)=(6,2)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #872 (ID: 470151)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
ABC ত্রিভুজের একটি বিন্দু [math]A(8,2)[/math] এবং BC বাহুর মধ্যবিন্দু [math]D(5,2)[/math] হলে ত্রিভুজটির ভরকেন্দ্রের স্থানাংক কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math](9,3)[/math]
খ. [math](3,9)[/math]
গ. [math](2,6)[/math]
ঘ. [math](6,2)[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
ভরকেন্দ্র A ও D বিন্দুর সংযোজক রেখাংশকে 2:1 অনুপাতে অর্ন্তবিভক্ত করে।[math]\therefore[/math]
 ভরকেন্দ্র [math]\left(\frac{8 \times 1+5 \times 2}{1+2}, \frac{2 \times 1+2 \times 2}{1+2}\right) \equiv(6,2)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #873 (ID: 470152)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (B Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y = 2[/math] রেখার উপর লম্ব এবং [math](h, k)[/math] বিন্দুগামী সরলরেখার সমীকরণ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]x-h=0[/math]
খ. [math]x-h=2[/math]
গ. [math]y-k=2[/math]
ঘ. [math]y-k=0[/math]
ঙ. [math]x-h=y-k[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
Solve: [math]y = 2[/math]
 রেখার লম্ব রেখা, [math]x + c = 0[/math]
 [math](h, k[/math]
 বিন্দুগামী হলে, [math]h + c = 0 ⇒ c = h[/math]
: লম্ব রেখার সমীকরণ, [math]x – h = 0 x-h=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #874 (ID: 470153)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]3x - 2y + 6 = 0[/math] সরলরেখা দ্বারা x - অক্ষের খন্ডিতাংশ কত একক?

Options:
ক. [math]-5[/math]
খ. [math]-2[/math]
গ. [math]4[/math]
ঘ. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]3 x-2 y=-6 \Rightarrow \frac{x}{-2}+\frac{y}{3}=1 \therefore x=-2[/math]

Explanation:
