Question #972 (ID: 470084)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2008-2009, 2022-2023, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2012-2013, 2011-2012, 2010-2011, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jagannath University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
y = 3x + 7 এবং 3y - x = 8 সরলরেখাদ্বয়ের মধ্যে অন্তর্ভুক্ত সূক্ষ্মকোণের মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\tan ^{-1}(1)[/math]
খ. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{3}{4}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{4}{3}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=3 x+7, m_{1}=3[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}3 y-x=8 \Rightarrow y=\frac{1}{3} x+\frac{8}{3}, m_{2}=\frac{1}{3} \\\tan \theta=\frac{3-\frac{1}{3}}{1+3 \cdot \frac{1}{2}}=\frac{8}{2 \times 3}=\frac{4}{3} \therefore \theta=\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{4}{3}\right)\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #973 (ID: 470008)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2004-2005 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
বিন্দুদ্বয়ের সংযোজক সরলরেখার লম্ব সমদ্বিখনন্ডকের সমীকরণ-

Options:
ক. x+3y-6=0
খ. x+y-9=0
গ. x-3y-6-0
ঘ. x+5y-9=0


Correct Answer: D. x+5y-9=0

Solution:
লম্বদ্বিখণ্ডকের সমীকরণ,[math](1-2) x+(-1-4) y=\frac{1}{2}\left(1^{2}+(-1)^{2}-2^{2}-4^{2}\right) \therefore x+5 y-9=0[/math]

Explanation:

Question #974 (ID: 470009)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
সরলরেখা 3x + 4y – 12 = 0 দ্বারা অক্ষদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী খণ্ডিত অংশের দৈর্ঘ্য-

Options:
ক. 3
খ. 5
গ. 9
ঘ. 8


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
খণ্ডিত অংশের দৈর্ঘ্য = [math]=\sqrt{4^{2}+3^{2}}=5[/math]

Question #975 (ID: 470010)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012, 2009-2010, 2007-2008, 2003-2004, 2002-2003, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2x-3y+6 = 0[/math] রেখার উপর লম্ব এবং [math](1,−1)[/math] বিন্দুগামী সরল রেখার সমীকরণ-

Options:
ক. [math]3 x+2 y=1[/math]
খ. [math]3 x-2 y=5[/math]
গ. [math]3 x+2 y=5[/math]
ঘ. [math]2 x+3 y=1[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
রেখাটি, [math]3 x+2 y=K \Rightarrow 3.1-2.1=K \Rightarrow K=1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 [math]3 x+2 y=1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #976 (ID: 470011)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011, 1999-2000, 2009-2010, 2020-2021, 2019-2020, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Chittagong (Unit A), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Mymensingh Board, University of Barishal
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি সরলরেখা সমীকরণ নির্ণয় কর যা (2, -3) বিন্দু দিয়ে যায় এবং 2x - 3y = 7 রেখার উপর লম্ব-

Options:
ক. x + 2y = 0
খ. 5x + 2y=13
গ. 3x + 2 y = 0
ঘ. 3x + 2y = 12


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
নির্ণয় রেখা, 3(x - 2) + 2(y + 3) = 0.3x + 2y = 0

Question #977 (ID: 470012)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 1999-2000, 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit D/D1)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
2x + 5y + 10 = 0 দ্বারা নির্দেশিত সরলরেখা এবং অক্ষয় দ্বারা বেষ্টিত ত্রিভুজের ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
ক. 10 বর্গ একক
খ. 20 বর্গ একক
গ. 2 বর্গ একক
ঘ. 5 বর্গ একক


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
ক্ষেত্রফল = [math]=\frac{1}{2}\left|\frac{\mathrm{c}^{2}}{\mathrm{ab}}\right|=\frac{1}{2} \frac{10^{2}}{2 \times 5}=5[/math] বর্গ একক

Explanation:

Question #978 (ID: 470013)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](0, 2)[/math] এবং [math](-2, 0)[/math] বিন্দুগামী সরলরেখা [math]x[/math]- থেকে অক্ষের ধনাত্মক দিকের সাথে কী কোণ উৎপন্ন করে? (What is the angel between the straight line passing through [math](0, 2[/math] and [math](-2, 0)[/math] and [math]x[/math]-axis in the positive direction?)

Options:
A. 30 0
B. 45 0
C. 62 0
D. 120 0


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
সরলেরেখা চাল,[math]\tan \theta=\frac{0-2}{-2-0}=.1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \theta=\tan (1)[/math]
 [math]\theta=45^{\circ}[/math]


Explanation:
এখানে, চালে সূত্র ব্যাবহার করা হযেছে।

Sub-Questions:

Question #979 (ID: 470014)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y[/math]-অক্ষের সমান্তরাল, এবং [math]2 x-7 y+11=0 \text { ; } x+3 y-8=0[/math] রেখাদ্বয়ের ছেদবিন্দু দিয়ে অতিক্রমকারী সরলরেখার সমীকরণ নিচের কোনটি? (What is the equation of the straight line that is parallel to y-axis and passing through the points of intersection of the lines [math]2 x-7 y+11=0 \text { and } x+3 y-8=0 ?)[/math])

Options:
A. [math]13 x-23=0[/math]
B. [math]3 x-7=0[/math]
C. [math]7 x-3=0[/math]
D. [math]23 x-13=0[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
রেখাটির সমীকরণ[math](2 x-7 y+11)+\lambda(4+3 y-8)=0-(i)[/math]
 [math]\rightarrow \text { (2) } 2 x-7 y+11+\lambda n+3 \lambda y-8 y=0[/math]
 [math]\rightarrow x(2+\lambda)+y(-7+3 \lambda)+11-8 \lambda=0[/math]
যেহেতু রেখাটি Y অক্ষের সমান্তরাল, তাই Y এর সহগ শূণ্য (0) হবে।[math]\therefore-7+3 \lambda=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \lambda=\frac{7}{3}[/math]
λ এর মান সমীকরনে বসালে[math]13 x-23=0[/math]


Explanation:
যদি এমন চায়, যে রেখাটি, ১ম ও ২য় রেখার ছেদবিন্দুগামী এবং X অথবা Y অক্ষের সমান্তরাল, তাহলে আমরা এই সমীকরণ ব্যাবহার করবো।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #980 (ID: 470015)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=1+\frac{1}{2+x}[/math] বক্ররেখা x অক্ষকে ‍A বিন্দুতে এবং Y অক্ষকে B বিন্দুতে ছেদ করলে AB সরলরেখার সমীকরণ নিচের কোনটি? (if the curve [math]y=1+\frac{1}{2+x}[/math] intersects x-axis and y-axis at, A and B, respectively, then which one of the following is the equation of AB?)

Options:
A. [math]x+2 y+3=0[/math]
B. [math]x+2 y-3=0[/math]
C. [math]x-2 y+3=0[/math]
D. [math]x-2 y-3=0[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=1+1 /(2+x)[/math]
বক্র রেখাটি-Y অক্ষকে ছেদ করে[math]A(-3,0)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে অক্ষকে x ছেদ করে, [math]B(0,3 / 2)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে।সমীকরণ[math]y-\frac{3}{2}=-1(h-0)[/math]
বা, [math]y=-\frac{x}{2}+\frac{3}{2}[/math]
বা, [math]4-2 y+3=0[/math]


Explanation:
প্রথমে x অক্ষ ও y অক্ষে বক্ররেখার ছেদ বিন্দু বের করা হয়েছে।এরপর,[math]y-y_{1}=m\left(n-x_{1}\right)[/math]সূত্রের সাহায্যে সরলরেখার সমীকরণ পাওয়া গেছে।

Sub-Questions:

Question #981 (ID: 470016)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](-\sqrt{3}, 3)[/math] কে [math]\frac{\pi}{7}[/math] কোণে ঘড়ির কাটার দিকে ঘুরালে, নতুন বিন্দুর পোলার স্থানাঙ্ক কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]\left(2 \sqrt{3}, \frac{\pi}{4}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\left(-2 \sqrt{3}, \frac{\pi}{4}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\left(\frac{1}{2}, \frac{\pi}{12}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(2 \sqrt{3}, \frac{11 \pi}{21}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math](-\sqrt{3}, 3) \text { এর } r=\sqrt{3+3^{2}}=\sqrt{12}=2 \sqrt{3}[/math]
এবং [math]\theta=\pi-\tan ^{-1}\left|\frac{3}{-\sqrt{3}}\right|=\pi-\frac{\pi}{3}=\frac{2 \pi}{3}[/math]
এখন ঘড়ির কাটার দিকে ঘুরালে, [math]\theta=\frac{2 \pi}{3}-\frac{\pi}{7}=\frac{11 \pi}{21}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 নির্ণেয় বিন্দুর পোলার স্থানাঙ্ক [math]\left(2 \sqrt{3}, \frac{11 \pi}{21}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #982 (ID: 470017)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
দুটি রেখা 2x + 3y = 1 এবং 3x + 2y = 1 এর ছেদবিন্দু ও ( 1, 1 ) বিন্দুগাম রেখার সমীকরণ নির্ণয় কর।

Options:
ক. x + y = 0
খ. x - y = 0
গ. x + y = 1
ঘ. None


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{2 x+3 y-1}{2 \times 1+3 \times 1-1}=\frac{3 x+2 y-1}{3 \times 1+2 \times 1-1}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 x+3 y-1=3 x+2 y-1 \Rightarrow x-y=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #983 (ID: 470018)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
দুইটি সরলরেখা পরস্পর লম্ব হলে তাদের ঢালের গুণফল কত?

Options:
ক. 1
খ. -1
গ. 0
ঘ. None


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
-1

Explanation:

Question #984 (ID: 470019)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
4x + 2y = 1 হতে (2, 3) এর দূরত্ব নির্ণয় কর।

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{13 \sqrt{5}}{\sqrt{10}}[/math] একক
খ. [math]\frac{13 \sqrt{10}}{\sqrt{5}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{13}}{10}[/math] একক
ঘ. [math]\frac{\sqrt{13}}{10}[/math] একক


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math](2,3)[/math]
 বিন্দু হতে [math]4 x+2 y-1=0[/math]
 এর দূরত্ব[math]\left|\frac{4 \times 2+2 \times 3-1}{\sqrt{4^{2}+2^{2}}}\right|=\frac{13}{\sqrt{20}}=\frac{13}{2 \sqrt{5}}=\frac{13 \sqrt{5}}{10}[/math]
 একক।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #985 (ID: 470020)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
তিনটি বিন্দু A (1, 3), B(-3, 5), C (a, 7) যদি 5 বর্গ একক ক্ষেত্রফল বিশিষ্ট ত্রিভুজের শীর্ষবিন্দু নির্দেশ করে তবে C বিন্দুগামী মধ্যমার দৈর্ঘ্য কত একক।

Options:
ক. 7
খ. 9
গ. [math]\sqrt{127}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\sqrt{130}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\Delta \mathrm{ABC}=\frac{1}{2}\left|\begin{array}{ccc}1 & 3 & 1 \\-3 & 5 & 1 \\\mathrm{a} & 7 & 1\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}(-2+9+3 a-21-5 a)=\frac{1}{2}(-2 a-14)=-a-7[/math]
প্রশ্নমতে, [math]-a-7=5 \Rightarrow a=-12[/math]
 [math]\begin{aligned}\mathrm{D}=(-1,4) \therefore \mathrm{CD} & =\sqrt{(-12+1)^{2}+(7-4)^{2}} \\& =\sqrt{(-11)^{2}+3^{2}}=\sqrt{121+9}=\sqrt{130}\end{aligned}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #986 (ID: 470021)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019-2020 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
(5,2) ও ( 4, 3) বিন্দুর সংযোগ রেখাকে y অক্ষ কত অনুপাতে অন্তর্বিভক্ত করে?

Options:
ক. 2:3
খ. 3:2
গ. 5:4
ঘ. 4:5


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\therefore[/math]
 y অক্ষ দ্বারা বিভক্তকারী অনুপাত = [math]\left|\frac{5}{-4}\right|=5: 4[/math]


Explanation:

Question #987 (ID: 470022)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]4 x+3 y=c[/math] এবং [math]12 x-5 y=2(c+3)[/math] রেখান্বয় মূলবিন্দু হতে সমদূরবর্তী। c এর মান হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]14[/math]
খ. [math]12[/math]
গ. [math]8[/math]
ঘ. [math]10[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{c}{5}=\pm \frac{2(c+3)}{13} \text { Solving } \Rightarrow c=10,-\frac{30}{23}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #988 (ID: 470023)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2008-2009, 2001-2002, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
a এর মান কত হলে [math]3 x+2 y-5=0, \text { ax }+4 y-9=0[/math] এবং [math]x+2 y-7=0[/math] রেখাত্রয় সমবিন্দু?

Options:
ক. [math]-7[/math]
খ. [math]5[/math]
গ. [math]3[/math]
ঘ. [math]7[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\left|\begin{array}{lll}3 & 2 & -5 \\a & 4 & -9 \\1 & 2 & -7\end{array}\right|=0 \text { Solving, } a=7[/math]

Explanation:

Question #989 (ID: 470024)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি ত্রিভুজের তিনটি শীর্ষবিন্দু [math]\mathbf{A}(5,12), \mathbf{B}(-12,5)[/math] এবং [math]C(-7,17)[/math] হলে, [math]\angle \mathrm{ACB}[/math] কোণের মান হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{\pi}{6}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\pi}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{\pi}{4}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
AC রেখার ঢাল = [math]m_{1}=-\frac{12}{5}[/math]
CB রেখার ঢাল = [math]m_{2}=\frac{5}{12}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\therefore \mathrm{m}_{1} \mathrm{~m}_{2}=-1 \\\Rightarrow \angle \mathrm{ACB}=\frac{\pi}{2}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #990 (ID: 470025)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
a এর মান কত হলে, [math]3 x+2 y-5=0, a x+4 y-9=0[/math] এবং [math]x+2 y-7=0[/math] রেখাত্রয় সমবিন্দু?

Options:
ক. - 7
খ. 5
গ. 3
ঘ. 7


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\left|\begin{array}{rrr}3 & 2 & -5 \\\text { a } & 4 & -9 \\1 & 2 & -7\end{array}\right|=0[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow 3(-28+18)-a(-14+10)+1(-18+20)=0 \\\Rightarrow 4 a=28 \Rightarrow a=7\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #991 (ID: 470026)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2021-2022, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2013-2014, 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Barishal, University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]4 x+3 y=c[/math] এবং [math]12 x-5 y=2(c+3)[/math] রেখাদ্বয় মূলবিন্দু হতে সমদূরবর্তী। c এর মান হবে -

Options:
ক. 14
খ. 12
গ. 8
ঘ. 10


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
মূলবিন্দু হতে সমদূরবর্তী রেখাদ্বয় হলে,[math]\begin{array}{l} \pm \frac{4.0+3.0-c}{\sqrt{4^{2}+3^{2}}}= \pm \frac{12.0-5.0-2(c+3)}{\sqrt{12^{2}+5^{2}}} \Rightarrow-\frac{c}{5}=-\frac{2(c+3)}{13} \\\Rightarrow-13 c=-10 c-30 \Rightarrow-3 c=-30 \therefore c=10\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #992 (ID: 470028)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x এর কোন মানের জন্য [math](1, − x), (1, x)[/math] এবং [math](x^2 – 1 )[/math] বিন্দু তিনটি একই - - সরলরেখায় অবস্থান করবে?

Options:
ক. 2,3,4
খ. - 3,2,3
গ. -1,0,1
ঘ. যে কোনো মানের জন্য


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\left|\begin{array}{ccc}1 & -x & 1 \\1 & x & 1 \\x^{2} & -1 & 1\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left|\begin{array}{ccc}0 & -2 x & 0 \\1 & x & 1 \\x^{2} & -1 & 1\end{array}\right|=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 x\left(1-x^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x=0, x^{2}=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x= \pm 1[/math]
 অর্থাৎ x = -1, 0, 1

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #993 (ID: 470029)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2019-2020, 2018-2019, 2018-2019, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](− 1, 3)[/math] এবং [math](4, – 2 )[/math] বিন্দুগামী সরলরেখা হতে অক্ষ দুটির মধ্যবর্তী খণ্ডিত অংশটুকুর দৈর্ঘ্য কত?

Options:
ক. 2
খ. [math]\frac{4}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\sqrt{7}[/math]
ঘ. [math]2 \sqrt{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math](–1, 3 )[/math]
 এবং [math](4, −2)[/math]
 বিন্দুগামী সরলরেখার সমীকরণ [math]\frac{x+1}{-1-4}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y-3}{3+2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{x+1}{-5}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{y-3}{5}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x+y=2[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \frac{x}{2}+\frac{y}{2}[/math]
 [math]=1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 অক্ষদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী অংশ = [math]=\sqrt{(2)^{2}+(2)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{4+4}[/math]
 [math]=2 \sqrt{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #994 (ID: 470030)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]a x+y+1=0, x+y+a=0[/math] এবং [math]x+a y+1=0[/math] রেখা তিনটি সমবিন্দু হলে, a এর মান হবে-

Options:
ক. 1,-2
খ. -1,2
গ. 1,2
ঘ. -1,-2


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\left|\begin{array}{lll}a & 1 & 1 \\1 & 1 & a \\1 & a & 1\end{array}\right|=0[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow a\left(1-a^{2}\right)-1(1-a)+1(a-1)=0 \\\Rightarrow a-a^{3}-1+a+a-1=0 \Rightarrow a^{3}-3 a+2=0 \\\Rightarrow a^{2}(a-1)+a(a-1)-2(a-1)=0 \Rightarrow(a-1)\left(a^{2}+a-2\right)=0 \\\Rightarrow(a-1)(a-1)(a+2)=0 \Rightarrow a=1,-2\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #995 (ID: 470031)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2017-2018, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোনো বৃত্তের সমান্তরাল দুটি স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ [math]2 x-4 y-9=0[/math] এবং [math]6 x-12 y+7=0[/math] বৃত্তের ব্যাসার্ধ কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{\sqrt{3}}{5}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{17}{3 \sqrt{5}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{17}{6 \sqrt{5}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{17}{5 \sqrt{3}}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]6 x-12 y+7=0 \Rightarrow 2 x-4 y+\frac{7}{3}=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 মধ্যবর্তী দূরত্ব যা বৃত্তের ব্যাস = [math]\left|\frac{\frac{7}{3}+9}{\sqrt{2^{2}+(-4)^{2}}}\right|=\frac{34}{3 \sqrt{20}}=\frac{17}{3 \sqrt{5}}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 = বৃত্তের ব্যাসার্ধ [math]=\frac{17}{2 \times 3 \sqrt{5}}=\frac{17}{6 \sqrt{5}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #996 (ID: 470032)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](1, 0).[/math] বিন্দু এবং [math]x + 1 = 0[/math] সরলরেখা থেকে সমদূরবর্তী বিন্দুসমূহের সেট যে সঞ্চারপথ গঠন করে তার সমীকরণ হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]x^{2}=2 y[/math]
খ. [math]y^{2}=4 x[/math]
গ. [math]x^{2}=4 y[/math]
ঘ. [math]\mathrm{y}^{2}=2 \mathrm{x}[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{(x+1)^{2}}{1}=(x-1)^{2}+(y-0)^{2} \Rightarrow x^{2}+2 x+1=x^{2}-2 x+1+y^{2} \Rightarrow y^{2}=4 x[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #997 (ID: 470033)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Rajshahi University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]4y = 3 (x – 4 )[/math] এবং [math]4y = 3 (x - 1 )[/math] রেখা দুইটির মধ্যবর্তী লম্ব দূরত্ব কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{9}{4}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{15}{9}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{9}{5}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\text { None of the above }[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]4 y=3(x-4),[/math]
 [math]4 y=3(x-1),[/math]
 [math]d=\frac{c_{1} \sim c_{2}}{\sqrt{a^{2}+b^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3 \times 4-3 \times 1}{\sqrt{3^{2}+4^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{9}{5}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #998 (ID: 470034)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011, 1999-2000, 2009-2010, 2020-2021, 2019-2020, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Chittagong (Unit A), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Mymensingh Board, University of Barishal
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি সরলরেখা সমীকরণ নির্ণয় কর যা (2, -3) বিন্দু দিয়ে যায় এবং 2x - 3y = 7 রেখার উপর লম্ব-

Options:
ক. x + 2y = 0
খ. 5x + 2y=13
গ. 3x + 2 y = 0
ঘ. 3x + 2y = 12


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
নির্ণয় রেখা, 3(x - 2) + 2(y + 3) = 0.3x + 2y = 0

Question #999 (ID: 470035)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2008-2009, 2001-2002, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
a এর মান কত হলে [math]3 x+2 y-5=0, \text { ax }+4 y-9=0[/math] এবং [math]x+2 y-7=0[/math] রেখাত্রয় সমবিন্দু?

Options:
ক. [math]-7[/math]
খ. [math]5[/math]
গ. [math]3[/math]
ঘ. [math]7[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\left|\begin{array}{lll}3 & 2 & -5 \\a & 4 & -9 \\1 & 2 & -7\end{array}\right|=0 \text { Solving, } a=7[/math]

Question #1000 (ID: 470036)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2x + 3y = 7[/math] এবং [math]3ax – 5by + 15 = 0[/math] সমীকরণ দুটি একই সরলরেখা প্রকাশ করলে a ও b ধ্রুবকের মান কত হবে? -

Options:
ক. [math]\left(-\frac{5}{7}, \frac{3}{7}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\left(-\frac{5}{7}, \frac{9}{7}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\left(-\frac{10}{7}, \frac{9}{7}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(-\frac{10}{7}, \frac{3}{7}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{2}{3 a}=\frac{3}{-5 b}=\frac{7}{-15} \Rightarrow a=-\frac{30}{21}=-\frac{10}{7} ; b=\frac{9}{7}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1001 (ID: 470037)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2008-2009, 2017-2018, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology, Khulna University of Engineering & Technology
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]ABC[/math] ত্রিভুজের শীর্ষবিন্দুগুলির স্থানাঙ্ক যথাক্রমে [math]A (0, 0), B(1, 5 )[/math] এবং [math]C (- 2, 2)[/math] হলে A বিন্দুগামী [math]BC[/math] রেখার উপর লম্বের সমীকরণ নির্ণয় কর।

Options:
ক. [math]2 x=y[/math]
খ. [math]x+y=0[/math]
গ. [math]3 x+5 y=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]x+5 y=2[/math]
ঙ. [math]7 x+y=3[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
ঢাল [math]\mathrm{BC}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{5-2}{1-2}=1[/math]
 [math]\therefore e q^{\mathrm{n}}, \mathrm{y}-0[/math]
 [math]=-1(\mathrm{x}-0)[/math]
 [math]=-\mathrm{x}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \mathrm{x}+\mathrm{y}[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1002 (ID: 470038)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2005-2006, 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
(2, 3) বিন্দু হতে 4x + 3y - 7 = 0 রেখার সাপেক্ষে প্রতিবিম্ব বিন্দুর দূরত্ব

Options:
ক. 2 unit
খ. 4 unit
গ. 3 unit
ঘ. 6 unit


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]d=\left|\frac{2 \times 4+3 \times 3-7}{\sqrt{4^{2}+3^{2}}}\right|=2 \text { unit }[/math]
প্রতিবিম্বের দূরত্ব = [math]2 d=2 \times 2=4[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1003 (ID: 470039)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2023-2024 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x-অক্ষের সাপেক্ষে 3x - 4y + 12 = 0 রেখাংশের প্রতিচ্ছবি কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]3 x-4 y-12=0[/math]
খ. [math]4 x-3 y+12=0[/math]
গ. [math]4 x+3 y+12=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]3 x+4 y+12=0[/math]
ঙ. [math]3 x+4 y-12=0[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
অক্ষের সাপেক্ষে 3x - 4y + 12 = 0 রেখাংশের প্রতিচ্ছবি [math]3x - 4(- y) + 12 =0 \\\Rightarrow3x+4y+12=0[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1004 (ID: 470040)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
OP রেখাংশকে ঘড়ির কাটার দিকে [math]\frac{2 \pi}{3}[/math] কোণে ঘুরানোতে তার নতুন অবস্থান হলো OQ। P এর স্থানাঙ্ক [math](-\sqrt{3},-3)[/math] হলে P ও Q এর মধ্যবর্তী দূরত্ব কত হবে?

Options:
ক. [math]4 \sqrt{3}[/math]
খ. 12
গ. [math]\sqrt{6}[/math]
ঘ. [math]2 \sqrt{3}[/math]
ঙ. 6


Correct Answer: E.6

Solution:
[math]r=\sqrt{(-\sqrt{3})^{2}+(-3)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]=2 \sqrt{3}[/math]
 [math]\theta=\pi+\tan ^{-1} \frac{1}{\sqrt{3}}[/math]
 [math]=\pi+\frac{\pi}{3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4 \pi}{3} ; \theta^{\prime}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{4 \pi}{3}-\frac{2 \pi}{3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{2 \pi}{3}[/math]
P এর স্থানাঙ্ক = [math]\left(2 \sqrt{3}, \frac{4 \pi}{3}\right)[/math]
 Q এর স্থানাঙ্ক = [math]\left(2 \sqrt{3}, \frac{2 \pi}{3}\right)[/math]
দূরত্ব:[math]=\sqrt{(2 \sqrt{3})^{2}+(2 \sqrt{3})^{2}-2 \times 2 \sqrt{3} \times 2 \sqrt{3} \cos \left(\frac{4 \pi}{3}-\frac{2 \pi}{3}\right)}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{12+12-24 \times \cos \frac{2 \pi}{3}}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{12+12-24 \times\left(-\frac{1}{2}\right)}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{12+12+12}[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{36}[/math]
 [math]=6[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1005 (ID: 470041)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x = y এবং x + y = 1 রেখা দুটির অন্তর্ভুক্ত কোণগুলোর সমদ্বিখন্ডকগুলোর সমীকরণ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. x+1=0 and y + 1 = 0
খ. 2x + 1 = 0 and 2y + 1 = 0
গ. 2x-1=0 and 2y-10
ঘ. x= 1 and y = 1
ঙ. x=0 and y=0


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\frac{x-y}{\sqrt{1^{2}+(-1)^{2}}}= \pm \frac{x+y-1}{\sqrt{1^{2}+1^{2}}} \Rightarrow x-y= \pm(x+y-1)[/math]
(+ Ve) নিয়ে, [math]x-y=x+y-1 \Rightarrow 2 y-1=0[/math]
(- Ve) নিয়ে, [math]x-y=-(x+y-1)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x-y+x+y-1=0 \Rightarrow 2 x-1=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1006 (ID: 470042)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
ABC ত্রিভুজের BC, CA, AB বাহুগুলোর মধ্যবিন্দুর স্থানাঙ্ক যথাক্রমে ( 2,4) (5, 0 ) এবং ( 4, -2)। ত্রিভুজটির ভরকেন্দ্রের স্থানাঙ্ক নিচের কোনটি।

Options:
ক. [math]\left(\frac{11}{3}, \frac{2}{3}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\left(\frac{22}{3}, \frac{4}{3}\right)[/math]
গ. (11,2)
ঘ. [math]\left(\frac{7}{3}, \frac{4}{3}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\therefore[/math]
 ভরকেন্দ্র [math]\equiv\left(\frac{2+5+4}{3}, \frac{4+0-2}{3}\right) \equiv\left(\frac{11}{3}, \frac{2}{3}\right)[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1007 (ID: 470043)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
P(2, 5), Q (5, 9) এবং S (6, 8) বিন্দুত্রয় PQRS রম্বসের শীর্ষবিন্দু হলে R এর স্থানাঙ্ক-

Options:
ক. (12,9)
খ. [math]\left(\frac{7}{2}, 7\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\left(4, \frac{13}{2}\right)[/math]
ঘ. (9, 12)


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
R = (6 + 5 - 2, 8 + 9 - 5)= (9, 12)

Question #1008 (ID: 470044)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]3 x-4 y+7=0[/math] এবং [math]2 x+k y+5=0[/math] সরলরেখাদ্বয় পরস্পর লম্ব হয়, k এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{2}{3}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{-3}{3}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{3}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\frac{2}{3}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]3 \times 2+(-4) \times k=0 \Rightarrow k=\frac{3}{2}[/math]

Question #1009 (ID: 470045)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
y = 3x + 1 এবং 3y - x = 4 রেখা দুইটির অন্তর্ভুক্ত কোণগুলোর সমদ্বিখণ্ডক y অক্ষকে P এবং Q বিন্দুতে ছেদ করে। PQ এর দূরত্ব নির্ণর কর ।

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
খ. [math]-\frac{1}{4}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=3 x+1[/math]
 এবং [math]3 y-x=4[/math]
 রেখাদ্বয়ের সমদ্বিখন্ডকদ্বয়,[math]\begin{array}{l}\frac{3 x-y+1}{\sqrt{3^{2}+1^{2}}}= \pm \frac{x-3 y+4}{\sqrt{1^{2}+3^{2}}} \Rightarrow 3 x-y+1= \pm(x-3 y+4) \\\Rightarrow 3 x-x-y+3 y+1-4=0,3 x+x-y-3 y+1+4=0 \\\Rightarrow 2 x+2 y=3,4 x-4 y=-5 \Rightarrow \frac{x}{3}+\frac{y}{\frac{3}{2}}=1, \frac{x}{2}+\frac{y}{4}=1 \\\therefore P \equiv\left(0, \frac{5}{4}\right), Q \equiv\left(0, \frac{5}{4}\right) \therefore|P Q|=\sqrt{\left(\frac{3}{2}-\frac{5}{4}\right)^{2}}=\frac{1}{4}\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1010 (ID: 470047)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](\alpha, \beta)[/math] বিন্দুগামী [math]y=\frac{\boldsymbol{\alpha x}}{\boldsymbol{\beta}}[/math] এর লম্ব রেখার সমীকরণ-

Options:
A. [math]\alpha x+\beta y=\alpha^{2}+\beta^{2}[/math]
B. [math]\alpha x+\beta y=2 \alpha \beta[/math]
C. [math]\alpha y+\beta x=2 \alpha{\beta}[/math]
D. [math]\alpha y+\beta x=\alpha^{2}+\beta^{2}[/math]
E. [math]\text { None of them }[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{\alpha x}{\beta} \Rightarrow \beta y=\alpha x \Rightarrow \alpha x-\beta y=0[/math]
রেখাটির লম্ব রেখার সমীকরণ, [math]\beta x+\alpha y=\beta \alpha+\alpha \beta[(\alpha, \beta)[/math]
বিন্দুগামী] [math]\Rightarrow \beta x+\alpha y=2 \alpha \beta[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1011 (ID: 470048)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021 | Boards:  | Tags: Engg Guccho (Ka Unit – Without Architecture)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](\alpha, \beta)[/math] বিন্দুগামী [math]y=\frac{\alpha x}{\beta}[/math] এর লম্ব রেখার সমীকরণ-

Options:
ক. [math]\alpha x+\beta y=\alpha^{2}+\beta^{2}[/math]
খ. [math]\alpha x+\beta y=2 \alpha \beta[/math]
গ. [math]\alpha y+\beta x=2 \alpha \beta[/math]
ঘ. [math]\alpha y+\beta x=\alpha^{2}+\beta^{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=\frac{a x}{\beta}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow \alpha x-\beta y=0[/math]
 রেখাটির উপরে লম্ব এবং [math](\alpha, \beta)[/math]
 বিন্দুগামী সরলরেখারসমীকরণ, [math]\beta(x-\alpha)+\alpha(y-\beta)=0[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow \beta x+\alpha y-2 \alpha \beta=0 \\\Rightarrow \alpha y+\beta x=2 \alpha \beta\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013, 2005-2006 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit)

খ. [math]\frac{b^{2}\left(m-m_{1}\right)}{2 m_{1} m}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{\mathrm{b}^{2}\left|\mathrm{~m}-\mathrm{m}_{1}\right|}{\mathrm{m}_{1} \mathrm{~m}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{\mathrm{b}^{2}\left|\mathrm{~m}-\mathrm{m}_{1}\right|}{2 \mathrm{~m}_{1} \mathrm{~m}}[/math]

Question #1013 (ID: 469996)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2012-2013 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x + 2y + 7 = 0 রেখাটির অক্ষদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী খণ্ডিতাংশ কোন বর্গের বাহু হলে, তার ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
ক. 61
খ. 61.25
গ. 61.50
ঘ. কোনোটিই নয়


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]x+2 y=-7 \Rightarrow \frac{x}{-7}+\frac{y}{\frac{-7}{2}}=1[/math]
খণ্ডিতাংশের মধ্যবিন্দু [math]=\left(-\frac{7}{2},-\frac{7}{4}\right)[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 অক্ষদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী খণ্ডিতাংশ = [math]=\sqrt{(-7)^{2}+\left(-\frac{7}{2}\right)^{2}}=7 \sqrt{\frac{5}{4}}[/math]
উক্ত বাহু দ্বারা গঠিত বর্গের ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\left(7 \sqrt{\frac{5}{4}}\right)^{2}=61.25[/math]
 বর্গ একক

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1014 (ID: 469997)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](2,-1),(a+1,a−3)[/math] ও [math](a + 2, a)[/math]- বিন্দু তিনটি সমরেখ হলে a এর মান-

Options:
ক. [math]4[/math]
খ. [math]2[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{4}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
(2, – 1), (a + 1, a – 3) ও (a + 2, a) বিন্দুত্রয় সমরেখ।[math]\therefore \frac{(a+1)-2}{(a-3)-(-1)}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{(a+2)-(a+1)}{a-(a-3)} \Rightarrow \frac{a-1}{a-2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{3} \Rightarrow 3 a-3=a-2 \Rightarrow 2 a[/math]
 [math]=1 \Rightarrow a[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\text { Alternative }\left|\begin{array}{ccc}2 & -1 & 1 \\a+1 & a-3 & 1 \\a+2 & a & 1\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left|\begin{array}{ccc}3 & -1 & 1 \\4 & a-3 & 1 \\2 & a & 1\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left|\begin{array}{ccc}0 & 0 & 1 \\1 & a-2 & 1 \\-1 & a+1 & 1\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=a+1+a-2=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 2 a-1=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow a[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1015 (ID: 469998)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2011-2012, 2009-2010, 2007-2008, 2003-2004, 2002-2003, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Rajshahi (C Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2x-3y+6 = 0[/math] রেখার উপর লম্ব এবং [math](1,−1)[/math] বিন্দুগামী সরল রেখার সমীকরণ-

Options:
ক. [math]3 x+2 y=1[/math]
খ. [math]3 x-2 y=5[/math]
গ. [math]3 x+2 y=5[/math]
ঘ. [math]2 x+3 y=1[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
রেখাটি, [math]3 x+2 y=K \Rightarrow 3.1-2.1=K \Rightarrow K=1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 [math]3 x+2 y=1[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1016 (ID: 469999)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2010-2011, 1999-2000, 2009-2010, 2020-2021, 2019-2020, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2012-2013, 2011-2012 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology, University of Chittagong (Unit A), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Mymensingh Board, University of Barishal
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি সরলরেখা সমীকরণ নির্ণয় কর যা (2, -3) বিন্দু দিয়ে যায় এবং 2x - 3y = 7 রেখার উপর লম্ব-

Options:
ক. x + 2y = 0
খ. 5x + 2y=13
গ. 3x + 2 y = 0
ঘ. 3x + 2y = 12


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
নির্ণয় রেখা, 3(x - 2) + 2(y + 3) = 0.3x + 2y = 0

Question #1017 (ID: 470000)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
A, B, C বিন্দুগুলোর স্থানাঙ্ক যথাক্রমে (a, be), (b, ca), (c, ab) হলে, [math]\triangle \mathbf{A B C}[/math] এর ক্ষেত্রফল কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{2} a b c[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{1}{2}(a-b)(b-c)(c-a)[/math]
গ. 3abc
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{2}(b-a)(b-c)(c-a)[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\Delta \mathrm{ABC}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}[/math]
 [math]\left|\begin{array}{lll}a & b c & 1 \\\mathrm{~b} & \mathrm{ca} & 1 \\\mathrm{c} & \mathrm{ab} & 1\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}\left|\begin{array}{ccc}\mathrm{a}-\mathrm{b} & -\mathrm{c}(\mathrm{a}-\mathrm{b}) & 0 \\\mathrm{~b}-\mathrm{c}-\mathrm{a}(\mathrm{b}-\mathrm{c}) & 0 \\\mathrm{c} & \mathrm{ab} & 1\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=\frac{1}{2}(\mathrm{a}-\mathrm{b})[/math]
 [math](\mathrm{b}-\mathrm{c})[/math]
 [math](\mathrm{c}-\mathrm{a})[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1018 (ID: 470001)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2008-2009, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y = 3x + 7[/math] এবং [math]3y - x = 8[/math] সরলরেখাদ্বয়ের মধ্যে অন্তর্ভুক্ত সূক্ষ্মকোণের মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{4}{3}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\tan ^{-1}(1)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{3}{4}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=3 x+7 ; y=\frac{1}{3} x+\frac{8}{3} \therefore \theta=\tan ^{-1} \frac{3-\frac{1}{3}}{1+3 \cdot \frac{1}{3}}=\tan ^{-1} \frac{4}{3}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1019 (ID: 470002)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2008-2009, 2022-2023, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2012-2013, 2011-2012, 2010-2011, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jagannath University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
y = 3x + 7 এবং 3y - x = 8 সরলরেখাদ্বয়ের মধ্যে অন্তর্ভুক্ত সূক্ষ্মকোণের মান কত?

Options:
ক. [math]\tan ^{-1}(1)[/math]
খ. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{3}{4}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{4}{3}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=3 x+7, m_{1}=3[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}3 y-x=8 \Rightarrow y=\frac{1}{3} x+\frac{8}{3}, m_{2}=\frac{1}{3} \\\tan \theta=\frac{3-\frac{1}{3}}{1+3 \cdot \frac{1}{2}}=\frac{8}{2 \times 3}=\frac{4}{3} \therefore \theta=\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{4}{3}\right)\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================

Question:
(4,– 2) বিন্দু থেকে 5x + 12y = 3 রেখার উপর অঙ্কিত লম্বের দৈর্ঘ্য-

Options:
ক. [math]-\frac{7}{13}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{8}{9}[/math]
গ. [math]-\frac{8}{9}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{7}{13}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
দূরত্ব [math]=\left|\frac{20-24-3}{13}\right|=\frac{7}{13}[/math]

Question #1021 (ID: 470004)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2006-2007, 2003-2004, 2019-2020, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2014-2015, 2013-2014, 2012-2013, 2012-2013, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Mymensingh Board, University of Chittagong (Unit A), Mymensingh Board, Pabna University of Science and Technology (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Shahjalal University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
- (-2, 1) বিন্দু হতে 4x - 3y + 1 = 0 সরলরেখার উপর অঙ্কিত লম্বের দৈর্ঘ্য-

Options:
ক. 1
খ. -2
গ. 2
ঘ. 3


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
লম্বের দৈর্ঘ্য = [math]=\left|\frac{4(-2)-3.1+1}{\sqrt{16+9}}\right|=\left|\frac{-10}{5}\right|=2[/math]

Question #1022 (ID: 470005)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2005-2006, 2015-2016, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি (x, y), (2, 3) এবং (5, – 1) একই সরলরেখায় অবস্থিত হয়, তবে নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?

Options:
ক. 4x-3y-17=0
খ. 3x+4y-17=0
গ. 3x+4y+17=0
ঘ. 4x+3y-17=0


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\frac{x-2}{y-3}=\frac{2-5}{3+1} \Rightarrow \frac{x-2}{y-3}=\frac{-3}{4}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 4 x-8=-3 y+9 \Rightarrow 4 x+3 y-17=0[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1023 (ID: 470006)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2005-2006, 2016-2017, 2007-2008 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
5x - 2y + 4 = 0 এবং 4x - 3y + 5 = 0 সরলরেখাদ্বয়ের ছেদবিন্দু এবং মূলবিন্দু দিয়ে গমনকারী সরলরেখার সমীকরণ-

Options:
ক. 2x-3y=0
খ. 3x-2y=0
গ. 2x-7y=0
ঘ. 9x+2y= 0


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
5(5x - 2y + 4) - 4(4x - 3y + 5) = 0 = 9x + 2y = 0

Explanation:

Question #1024 (ID: 470007)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2004-2005, 2019-2020, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jatiya Kabi Kazi Nazrul Islam University (A Unit), University of Barishal
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি সরলরেখার অক্ষদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী অংশ (2, 3) বিন্দুতে সমদ্বিখন্ডিত হয়। সরলরেখাটির সমীকরণ-

Options:
ক. 2x + 3y -12 = 0
খ. B3x + 2y - 12 = 0
গ. 2x + 3y - 6 = 0
ঘ. 3x + 2y - 6 = 0


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{x}{2.2}+\frac{y}{2.3}=1 \Rightarrow 3 x+2 y=12 \therefore 3 x+2 y-12=0[/math]

Question #1025 (ID: 469986)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Mymensingh Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
(1, 4) এবং (9, 12) বিন্দুদ্বয়ের সংযোজক রেখা যে বিন্দুতে 3:5 অনুপাতে অন্তর্বিভক্ত হয়, তার স্থানাঙ্ক কত?

Options:
ক. (5, 8)
খ. (8,5)
গ. (4,7)
ঘ. (7,4)


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
বিন্দুটি = [math]\left(\frac{3 \times 9+5 \times 1}{3+5}, \frac{3 \times 12+5 \times 4}{3+5}\right)=(4,7)[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1026 (ID: 469987)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2022-2023, 2022-2023, 2020-2021, 2018-2019, 2017-2018, 2016-2017, 2015-2016, 2014-2015, 2012-2013, 2012-2013, 2005-2006, 2002-2003 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A), University of Chittagong (Unit A), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), Islamic University, Bangladesh (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
x অক্ষ ও [math](−5, –7)[/math] থেকে [math](4, k)[/math] বিন্দুটির দূরত্ব সমান হলে, k এর মান -

Options:
ক. 5/7
খ. 65/7
গ. -25/7
ঘ. -65/7


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
প্রশ্নমতে, [math]k[/math]
 [math]=\sqrt{(4+5)^{2}+(k+7)^{2}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow k^{2}=81+k^{2}+14 k+49[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 14 k[/math]
 [math]=-81-49[/math]
 [math]=-130[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow k[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{130}{14}[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{65}{7}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1027 (ID: 469988)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2015-2016, 2010-2011 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
(a, 0) এবং (0, b) বিন্দুগামী সরলরেখার উপর (1, 1) একটি বিন্দু হলে-

Options:
ক. a+b=1
খ. [math]\frac{1}{a}+\frac{1}{b}=1[/math]
গ. a-b=1
ঘ. [math]\frac{1}{a}-\frac{1}{b}=1[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
(a, 0 ) ও (0, b) বিন্দুগামী সরলরেখার সমীকরণ [math]\frac{x}{a}+\frac{y}{b}=1[/math]
 ইহা (1, 1) বিন্দু গামী হলে [math]\frac{1}{a}+\frac{1}{b}=1[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1028 (ID: 469989)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015, 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]3 x+5 y=2,2 x+3 y=0, a x+b y+1=0[/math] সমবিন্দুগামী হলে, a এবং b এর সম্পর্ক-

Options:
ক. [math]4 a-6 b=1[/math]
খ. [math]4 a-6 b=2[/math]
গ. [math]6 a-4 b=1[/math]
ঘ. [math]6 a-4 b=2[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]\left|\begin{array}{ccc}3 & 5 & 2 \\2 & 3 & 0 \\a & b & -1\end{array}\right|=0[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\Rightarrow 3(-3-0)-5(-2-0)+2(2 b-3 a)=0 \\\Rightarrow-9+10+4 b-6 a=0 \therefore 6 a-4 b=1\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1029 (ID: 469990)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2007-2008, 2019-2020, 2008-2009, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Bangladesh University of Textiles, University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=1+\frac{1}{2+x}[/math] বক্ররেখা x অক্ষকে A বিন্দুতে এবং y অক্ষকে B বিন্দুতে ছেদ করলে AB সরলরেখার সমীকরণ নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. x+2y+3=0
খ. x+2y-3=
গ. x-2y+3=0
ঘ. x-2y-3=0


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
x অক্ষে [math]y=0 \therefore 0=1+\frac{1}{2+x} \Rightarrow x=-3[/math]
y অক্ষে [math]x=0 \therefore y=1+\frac{1}{2}=\frac{3}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 A ও B বিন্দুর স্থানাঙ্ক যথাক্রমে (-3,0) ও [math]\left(0, \frac{3}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 AB এর সমীকরণ [math]\frac{x}{-3}+\frac{y}{\frac{3}{2}}=1 \Rightarrow x-2 y+3=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1030 (ID: 469991)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2010-2011, 2016-2017, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]5x – 7y – 15 = 0[/math] সরলরেখার উপর লম্ব এবং (2, 3) বিন্দুগামী সরলরেখার সমীকরণ হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]7 x-5 y-29=0[/math]
খ. [math]5 x-7 y-31=0[/math]
গ. [math]5 x+7 y+11=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]7 x+5 y+1=0[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]7 x+5 y+k=0,(2,-3)[/math]
 বিন্দুগামী বলে [math]7.2+5(-3)+\mathrm{k}=0 \Rightarrow \mathrm{k}=1 \therefore 7 \mathrm{x}+5 \mathrm{y}+1=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1031 (ID: 469992)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014, 2018-2019, 2009-2010 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math](3,-1)[/math] স্থানাঙ্ক- এবং [math](5,2)[/math] বিন্দুদ্বয়ের সংযোগকারী সরলরেখাকে 3:4 অনুপাতে বহিঃস্থভাবে বিভক্তকারী বিন্দুর স্থানাঙ্ক (x,y)

Options:
ক. [math]\left(\frac{17}{3}, 3\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\left(\frac{27}{7}, \frac{2}{7}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\left(\frac{27}{4}, \frac{4}{3}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\text { None }[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
বহিঃস্থভাবে বিভক্ত করায় [math]x=\frac{3 \times 5-4 \times 3}{3-4}=-3 ; y=\frac{3 \times 2-4 \times(-1)}{3-4}=-10[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1032 (ID: 469993)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x + y = 3[/math] এবং [math]y − x = 1[/math] সরলরেখাদ্বয়ের ছেদবিন্দুগামী x অক্ষের সমান্তরাল সরলরেখার সমীকরণ –

Options:
ক. [math]y=2[/math]
খ. [math]2 y=3[/math]
গ. [math]x=1[/math]
ঘ. [math]x+3=0[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]x+y=3....(i)[/math]
 [math]y-x=1[/math]
 [math]\text { (1), (2) Solve }[/math]
 করে [math]x=1, y=2[/math]
x অক্ষের সমান্তরাল বলায় রেখারসমীকরণ [math]y = 2[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1035 (ID: 469981)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোনো বিন্দুর পোলার স্থানাংক [math](3,150°)[/math] হলে ঐ বিন্দুর কার্তেসীয় স্থানাংক-

Options:
ক. [math]\left(\frac{3 \sqrt{3}}{2}, \frac{3}{2}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\left(\frac{3 \sqrt{3}}{2},-\frac{3}{2}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\left(-\frac{3 \sqrt{3}}{2}, \frac{3}{2}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(-\frac{3 \sqrt{3}}{2},-\frac{3}{2}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]x=r \cos \theta[/math]
 [math]=3 \cos 150^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]=3\left(-\sin 60^{\circ}\right)[/math]
 [math]=-\frac{3 \sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]
 [math]y=r \sin \theta[/math]
 [math]=3 \sin 150^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]=3 \cos 60^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{2}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1036 (ID: 469983)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2015-2016, 2013-2014 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jahangirnagar University (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোন বিন্দুর পোলার স্থানাঙ্ক (3,150 ° ) হলে, ঐ বিন্দুর কার্তেসীয় স্থানাঙ্ক-

Options:
ক. [math]\left(\frac{3 \sqrt{3}}{2}, \frac{3}{2}\right)[/math]
খ. [math]\left(\frac{3 \sqrt{3}}{2},-\frac{3}{2}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\left(-\frac{3 \sqrt{3}}{2}, \frac{3}{2}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]\left(-\frac{3 \sqrt{3}}{2},-\frac{3}{2}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]x=3 \cos 150^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]=3[/math]
 [math]\cos \left(180^{\circ}-30^{\circ}\right)[/math]
 [math]=-3[/math]
 [math]\cos 30^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{-3 \sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]
 [math]y=3 \sin \left(180^{\circ}-30^{\circ}\right)[/math]
 [math]=3[/math]
 [math]\sin 30^{\circ}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{3}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 কার্তেসীয় স্থানাঙ্ক [math]\equiv\left(\frac{-3 \sqrt{3}}{2}, \frac{3}{2}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1037 (ID: 469984)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y = - 5x + 9[/math] রেখার সাথে লম্ব রেখার নতি-

Options:
ক. [math]5[/math]
খ. [math]-5[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{1}{5}[/math]
ঘ. [math]-\frac{1}{5}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y=-5 x+9 ; m_{1}=-5 ; m_{1} m_{2}=-1 \therefore m_{2}=\frac{1}{5}[/math]
$$\\$[math]\boxed {\mathrm {Another\ Solution} }[/math]
y = - 5x + 9 এর ঢাল = - 5 এর লম্বের ঢাল m হলে,m(-5) [math]\therefore[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{m}=\frac{1}{5}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1038 (ID: 469985)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2014-2015 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]3x + 5y = 2, 2x + 3y = 0, ax + by + 1 = 0[/math] সমবিন্দুগামী হলে a এবং b এর সম্পর্ক-

Options:
ক. [math]4 a-6 b=1[/math]
খ. [math]4 a-6 b=2[/math]
গ. [math]6 a-4 b=1[/math]
ঘ. [math]6 a-4 b=2[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ছেদ বিন্দু হল [math](-6,4) \therefore-6 a+4 b+1=0 \Rightarrow 6 a-4 b=1[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1039 (ID: 469974)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
y-অক্ষের সমান্তরাল এবং [math]2x – 7y + 11 = 0[/math] ও [math]x + 3y = 8[/math] রেখাদ্বয়ের ছেদবিন্দু দিয়ে অতিক্রমকারী সরলরেখার সমীকরণ-

Options:
ক. [math]13 x-23=0[/math]
খ. [math]3 x-7=0[/math]
গ. [math]7 x-3=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]23 x-13=0[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]2 x-7 y+11=0[/math]
 [math]x+3 y=8[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x[/math]
 [math]=8-3 y[/math]
 [math]\therefore x[/math]
 [math]=8-\frac{81}{13}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{23}{13}[/math]
 [math]2(8-3 y)-7 y+11[/math]
 [math]=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 16-6 y-7 y+11=0[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow y=\frac{27}{13}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 সমীকরণ [math]x=\frac{23}{13}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow 13 x-23=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1040 (ID: 469975)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2010-2011, 2016-2017, 2015-2016 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Jagannath University (A Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]5x – 7y – 15 = 0[/math] সরলরেখার উপর লম্ব এবং (2, 3) বিন্দুগামী সরলরেখার সমীকরণ হবে-

Options:
ক. [math]7 x-5 y-29=0[/math]
খ. [math]5 x-7 y-31=0[/math]
গ. [math]5 x+7 y+11=0[/math]
ঘ. [math]7 x+5 y+1=0[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]7 x+5 y+k=0,(2,-3)[/math]
 বিন্দুগামী বলে [math]7.2+5(-3)+\mathrm{k}=0 \Rightarrow \mathrm{k}=1 \therefore 7 \mathrm{x}+5 \mathrm{y}+1=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1041 (ID: 469976)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2x + 3y – 4 = 0[/math] এবং [math]x \cos \alpha+y \sin \alpha=p[/math] একই সরলরেখা নির্দেশ করলে p এর মান-

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{13}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{13}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{13}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{4}{\sqrt{13}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
একই সরলরেখা [math]\therefore \frac{\cos \alpha}{2}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{\sin \alpha}{3}[/math]
 [math]=\frac{P}{4},[/math]
 [math]\cos ^{2} \alpha+\sin ^{2} \alpha=1[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{P^{2}}{4}+\frac{9 P^{2}}{16}=1[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow P=\frac{4}{\sqrt{13}}[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1042 (ID: 469977)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]x = a[/math] এবং [math]\sqrt{3} x-y+1=0[/math] রেখাদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী সূক্ষ্মকোণের মান-

Options:
ক. [math]30^{\circ}[/math]
খ. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]
গ. [math]60[/math]
ঘ. [math]75^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]\sqrt{3} x-y+1=0 \Rightarrow y=\sqrt{3} x-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেখাটি x-অক্ষের সাথে [math]60°[/math]
 কোণ এবং y অক্ষ বা y-অক্ষের সমান্তরাল যেকোনরেখা [math]x = a[/math]
 এর সাথে [math]( 90° - 60° ) = 30°[/math]
 কোণ উৎপন্ন করে ।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1043 (ID: 469978)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
(x, y), (2, 2) এবং (3, 3) বিন্দু তিনটি একই সরলরেখায় অবস্থিত হলে-

Options:
ক. x - 2y + 1 = 0
খ. x - y = 0
গ. 2x - y + 3 = 0
ঘ. Dx - y + 1 = 0


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\frac{y-2}{x-2}=\frac{2-3}{2-3} \Rightarrow x-2=y-2 \Rightarrow x-y=0[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1044 (ID: 469979)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2016-2017, 2022-2023, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]2 x+3 y-4=0[/math] এবং [math]x \cos \alpha+y \sin \alpha=p[/math] একই সরলরেখা নিদের্শ করলে p এর মান-

Options:
ক. [math]\frac{1}{\sqrt{13}}[/math]
খ. [math]\frac{2}{\sqrt{13}}[/math]
গ. [math]\frac{3}{\sqrt{13}}[/math]
ঘ. [math]\frac{4}{\sqrt{13}}[/math]


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
প্রদত্ত রেখাদ্বয় একই,[math]\begin{array}{l}\therefore \frac{\cos \alpha}{2}=\frac{\sin \alpha}{3}=\frac{\mathrm{P}}{4} \Rightarrow \cos \alpha=\frac{\mathrm{P}}{2}, \sin \alpha=\frac{3 \mathrm{P}}{4} \\\Rightarrow \cos ^{2} \alpha+\sin ^{2} \alpha=\frac{\mathrm{P}^{2}}{4}+\frac{9 \mathrm{P}^{2}}{16} \Rightarrow \mathrm{P}^{2}\left(\frac{4+9}{16}\right)=1 \\\Rightarrow \mathrm{P}^{2}=\frac{16}{13} \therefore \mathrm{P}=\frac{4}{\sqrt{13}}\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1046 (ID: 469972)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2020-2021, 2018-2019 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Agriculture Cluster Admission System, Jessore University of Science & Technology (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=x+4[/math] এবং [math]y=x[/math] রেখাদ্বয়ের লম্ব দূরত্ব -

Options:
ক. 4 একক
খ. [math]2 \sqrt{2}[/math] একক
গ. 2 একক
ঘ. [math]4 \sqrt{2}[/math] একক


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]y=x+4 \Rightarrow x-y+4=0[/math]
এবং [math]y=x \Rightarrow x-y+0=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেখাদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী দূরত্ব = [math]\left|\frac{4-0}{\sqrt{1^{2}+(-1)^{2}}}\right|=\frac{4}{\sqrt{2}}=2 \sqrt{2}[/math]
 একক।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1047 (ID: 469961)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (C  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
উৎপত্তি থেকে বিন্দু (−6, 8) এর দূরত্ব কত?

Options:
ক. 8
খ. 11
গ. 10
ঘ. 0


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:

[Image]
উৎপত্তি অর্থাৎ মূলবিন্দু থেকে (−6, 8) এর দূরত্ব[math]=\sqrt{(0+6)^{2}+(0-8)^{2}}=\sqrt{6^{2}+8^{2}}=10[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1048 (ID: 469962)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের কোন বিন্দুটি (1, 2) এবং ( 4, 5 ) বিন্দুগামী রেখাটিকে 2 : 1 অনুপাতে বিভক্ত করে?

Options:
ক. (3,4)
খ. (4,3)
গ. (5,4)
ঘ. (5, 3)


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
বিন্দু = [math]=\left(\frac{2 \times 4+1 \times 1}{2+1}, \frac{2 \times 5+1 \times 2}{2+1}\right)=(3,4)[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1049 (ID: 469963)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2022-2023, 2007-2008, 2019-2020, 2008-2009, 2008-2009 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Bangladesh University of Textiles, Jagannath University (A Unit), University of Rajshahi (A Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=1+\frac{1}{2+x}[/math] বক্ররেখা x অক্ষকে A বিন্দুতে এবং y অক্ষকে B বিন্দুতে ছেদ করলে AB সরলরেখার সমীকরণ নিচের কোনটি?

Options:
ক. x+2y+3=0
খ. x+2y-3=
গ. x-2y+3=0
ঘ. x-2y-3=0


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
x অক্ষে [math]y=0 \therefore 0=1+\frac{1}{2+x} \Rightarrow x=-3[/math]
y অক্ষে [math]x=0 \therefore y=1+\frac{1}{2}=\frac{3}{2}[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 A ও B বিন্দুর স্থানাঙ্ক যথাক্রমে (-3,0) ও [math]\left(0, \frac{3}{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 AB এর সমীকরণ [math]\frac{x}{-3}+\frac{y}{\frac{3}{2}}=1 \Rightarrow x-2 y+3=0[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1050 (ID: 469964)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021-2022, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Science and Technology University, Gopalganj (A Unit
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\mathbf{r}=\mathbf{a} \sqrt{\cos 2 \theta}[/math] এর কার্তেসীয় সমীকরণ-

Options:
A. [math]\left(x^{2}+y^{2}\right)^{2}=a\left(x^{2}-y^{2}\right)[/math]
B. [math]\left(x^{2}-y^{2}\right)^{2}=a\left(x^{2}+y^{2}\right)[/math]
C. [math]\left(x^{2}+y^{2}\right)^{2}=a^{2}\left(x^{2}-y^{2}\right)[/math]
D. [math]\left(x^{2}-y^{2}\right)^{2}=a^{2}\left(x^{2}+y^{2}\right)[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]r=a \sqrt{\cos 2 \theta}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow r^{2}=a^{2} \cos 2 \theta[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow x^{2}+y^{2}=a^{2}[/math]
 [math]\left(\cos ^{2} \theta-\sin ^{2} \theta\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(x^{2}+y^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=a^{2}[/math]
 [math]\left(\frac{x^{2}}{r^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{r^{2}}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow r^{2}\left(x^{2}+y^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=a^{2}\left(x^{2}-y^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow\left(x^{2}+y^{2}\right)^{2}[/math]
 [math]=a^{2}\left(x^{2}-y^{2}\right)[/math]


Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1051 (ID: 469965)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2020-2021, 2022-2023 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Chittagong (Unit A)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোনো বিন্দুর পোলার স্থানাঙ্ক (c,Π) হলে বিন্দুটির কার্তেসীয় স্থানাঙ্ক কত?

Options:
ক. (-1, 0)
খ. (-c, 0)
গ. (c, -c)
ঘ. (-c, c)


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]\begin{array}{l}X=r \cos \theta \\=c \cdot \cos (\pi) \\=-c \\Y=r \sin \theta \\=c \cdot \sin (\pi) \\=0\end{array}[/math]

Explanation:

Question #1053 (ID: 469968)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Question:
[math]y = b[/math] এবং [math]\sqrt{3} x-y+1=0[/math] রেখাদ্বয়ের অন্তর্ভুক্ত সুক্ষ্মকোণের মান-

Options:
ক. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]
খ. [math]45^{\circ}[/math]
গ. [math]60^{\circ}[/math]
ঘ. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
[math]y = b, x[/math]
 অক্ষের সমান্তরাল তাই [math]\tan \theta=[/math]
 ঢাল [math]=\sqrt{3} ; \theta=60^{\circ}[/math]

Question #1054 (ID: 469970)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2018-2019, 2017-2018 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit), University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
(0, 0), (3, 3), (3, – 5) বিন্দুগুলো দ্বারা গঠিত ত্রিভুজের ক্ষেত্রফল কোনটি?

Options:
ক. 10
খ. 11
গ. 12
ঘ. 13


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:
ক্ষেত্রফল = [math]=\frac{1}{2}|3(-5)-3 \times 3|=\frac{1}{2} \times 24=12[/math] = 12 বর্গএকক ।

Explanation:

Question #1055 (ID: 469958)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
চিত্রের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও:

[Image]


AB সরলরেখার সমীকরণ কোনটি?

Options:
ক. [math]\sqrt{3} x+y=6[/math]
খ. [math]x+\sqrt{3} y=6[/math]
গ. [math]\sqrt{3 x}-y=6[/math]
ঘ. [math]x-\sqrt{3 y}=6[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
[math]x \cos 60^{\circ}+y \sin 60^{\circ}=3[/math]
বা, [math]\frac{x}{2}+\frac{\sqrt{3} y}{2}=3 \quad \therefore x+\sqrt{3} y=6[/math]


Explanation:

Question #1056 (ID: 469959)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2024-2025 | Boards:  | Tags: University of Dhaka (A  Unit)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
3x+7y=21 এবং 2ax−3by+6=0 সমীকরণদ্বয় একই সরলরেখা প্রকাশ করলে a এবং b এর মান কত?

Options:
ক. a=1,b=2
খ. a=37​,b=32​
গ. a=0,b=1
ঘ. a=21​,b=4


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
একই রেখা প্রকাশ করতে হলে অনুপাত: [math]\frac{3}{2a} = \frac{7}{-3b}[/math]
 ⇒ [math]a = \frac{7}{3}, b = \frac{2}{3}[/math]


Explanation:

Options:
ক. 7:10
খ. 10:7
গ. 7:5
ঘ. 5:7


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:

Question #1059 (ID: 469957)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]y=-2 x[/math] এবং [math]2 y=x[/math] রেখাদ্বয়ের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ নিচের কোনটি ?

Options:
ক. [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
খ. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{5}{4}\right)[/math]
গ. [math]\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{-5}{4}\right)[/math]
ঘ. [math]0^{\circ}[/math]


Correct Answer: ক

Solution:
[math]y=-2 x[/math]
 রেখার ঢাল, [math]m_{1}=-2[/math]
 [math]x=2 y[/math]
 রেখার ঢাল, [math]m_{2}=\frac{1}{2} \therefore m_{1} \times m_{2}=-2 \times \frac{1}{2}=-1[/math]
 [math]\therefore[/math]
 রেখাদ্বয় পরস্পর লম্ব এবং মধ্যবর্তী কোণ [math]90^{\circ}[/math]
।

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #1060 (ID: 469955)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Jessore Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:

[Image]


মূল বিন্দু হতে AB এর লম্ব দূরত্ব কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]\frac{25}{12}[/math]
B. [math]\frac{12}{25}[/math]
C. [math]\frac{12}{5}[/math]
D. [math]\frac{5}{12}[/math]


Correct Answer: গ

Solution:


Explanation:

Question #1061 (ID: 469954)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:

[Image]


[math]\triangle O A C[/math]-এর ক্ষেত্রফল কোনটি?

Options:
A. [math]3 \sqrt{3}[/math] বর্গ একক
B. [math]\frac{9}{2}[/math] বর্গ একক
C. [math]9[/math] বর্গ একক
D. [math]\frac{9 \sqrt{3}}{2}[/math] বর্গ একক


Correct Answer: ঘ

Solution:
[math]\triangle \mathrm{OAC}[/math]
 হতে [math]\tan 60^{\circ}=\frac{\mathrm{AC}}{\mathrm{OC}} \Rightarrow\sqrt{3}=\frac{\mathrm{AC}}{3} \therefore \mathrm{AC}=3 \sqrt{3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \triangle \mathrm{OAC}[/math]
 ক্ষেত্রফল [math]=\frac{1}{2} \times 3 \times 3 \sqrt{3}=\frac{9 \sqrt{3}}{2}[/math]
 বর্গ একক

Explanation:


Sub-Questions:

Question #1067 (ID: 469945)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: MCQ | Book: উচ্চতর গণিত ১ম পত্র | Years: 2017 | Boards:  | Tags: Cumilla Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
উদ্দীপকের আলোকে প্রশ্নের উত্তর দাও.


[Image]


চিত্রে CD, AB বাহুর উপর অঙ্কিত মধ্যমা।

CD এর দৈর্ঘ্য কত একক?

Options:
ক. [math]10[/math]
খ. [math]5[/math]
গ. [math]4[/math]
ঘ. [math]3[/math]


Correct Answer: খ

Solution:
D বিন্দুর স্থানাঙ্ক [math]\left(\frac{-3+7}{2}, \frac{-3-1}{2}\right) \equiv(2,-2)[/math]
 [math]\therefore C D=\sqrt{(5-2)^{2}+(2+2)^{2}}=5[/math]


Explanation:
